Fluency in both English and Cantonese is mandatory.', 'Client Details', 'Our client is a well-known banking corporation with solid business in different areas. Fluency in both English and Cantonese are mandatory.', 'Description', 'Job Responsibilities:', 'Lead the team to provide project management and internal consultancy services on project', 'Provide support for PMO over project time line management and resources management', 'Drive agile project implementation with Agile/ Scrum methodologies', 'Monitor the overall project scope and report to senior management when necessary', 'Ad-hoc task as required', 'Profile', 'Job Requirements:', 'Bachelors Degree or above in Information Technology, Finance, Banking, or related disciplines', 'At least 4 years of experience in Project Management, preferably in banking']

job description: ['The opportunity', 'The Strategy and Transactions (SaT) teams in Asia- Pacific has been providing market leading services to clients across Greater China, ASEAN and Oceania for over 20 years. We support EY clients in the region and globally throughout the transaction lifecycle and have helped EY clients create deal value and manage transaction risks.\xa0 Similar to all service lines in EY organization, SaT operates with financial services sector focused teams and another broad industry teams.', 'FSO SaT focus on serving clients in the banking, insurance, asset management and FinTech sectors, which are highly regulated segments bringing more sector specific training and exposures.\xa0 Staff Accountants can join to support EY Asia- Pacific FSO SaT practices. In this role you will have exposure to different sub-service lines in SaT, namely Transactions and Corporate Finance (TCF) and EY- Parthenon (EY-P).', 'Transactions and Corporate Finance (TCF)', 'covers 3 sectors including Transaction Diligence (TD), Valuation, Modeling and Economics (VME) and Lead Advisory.', 'Transaction Diligence (TD)', 'advises clients on buy-side and sell-side financial and operation due diligence. We work closely with Strategy and Transactions sub-service lines and competencies, and other EY service lines to provide seamless, highly integrated due diligence to EY clients.', 'Valuation, Modeling and Economics (VME)', 'practices are the means by which we continue to bring\xa0 deep financial, economics and analytics skills to bear in order to support EY clients with better decision-making involving transactions, funding capital expansion and improving capital efficiency (such as capital allocation to help adjust risk, cash release opportunity, capital budgeting with skill sets on measuring and valuating not just assets but also litigation or life).', 'Lead Advisory', 'includes tactical and strategic advice for corporates, financial sponsors and family offices, as well as negotiation assistance and other transaction related topics.']

job description: ['YKONE ASIA LIMITED', 'Ykone Asia is an International digital and creative agency for Luxury and major brands providing the following services: Social Media Management including paid social & social commerce / Branding localisation for China market / Influencer Marketing / Digital campaigns / Content production / Consulting & Training.', 'Founded in 2008, Ykone has since become the leading partner worldwide for brands to create impactful stories and content on social media. With an initial focus on influence, our founding mission was to bring together brands and the best content creators, artists, celebrities worldwide.', 'Today, over 100 brands trust Ykone,\xa0we\xa0are prouf of\xa0the long term relationships we have built with the\xa0biggest\xa0players in the luxury\xa0market. As our expertise grew, we have built a multicultural team over the world operating in 10 offices\xa0(Paris, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Singapore, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Bangalore, Milan, Geneva, and Berlin)\xa0that allow us to create creative campaigns that are locally and culturally relevant for each market.', 'We believe that creative ideas shine brighter when they are supported by data. Performance marketing and data analysis is at the core of every one of our campaigns, powered by our in house technology « Campaygn » which every team members uses, well beyond our data team.', 'A few clients: Richemont, Cartier, Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Chopard, Berluti, Marriott, Tag Heuer, Panerai, Chow Tai Fook, Freywille, Nespresso, YSL Beauty, Biotherm, La Mer, Lancôme', 'www.ykone.com', 'Senior Digital Account Manager – International Digital Luxury agency', 'Position overview', 'We are currently looking for an experienced Senior Account Manager in Hong Kong to help manage a client portfolio of lifestyle and luxury brands. Cantonese and English are a must. Mandarin a plus.', 'Client engagements include both local HK and Asia regional work. Candidate will be required to work with local teams and colleagues and clients around the world.', 'The successful applicant should have at least 3 to 4 years digital experience (either consumer or corporate background) and have experience managing people and client relationships and executing integrated communications campaigns in HK and across Asia.', 'Responsibilities:', '-\xa0Manage a team & manage daily local and regional accounts in the luxury and lifestyle industry', '-\xa0Execute integrated digital strategies that include influencers activations, digital marketing and social media content productions', '-\xa0Help develop strategic thinking across client work and provide communications counsel & develop client plans, documents and content to a high standard', '-\xa0Proactively suggest new ideas and strategies to grow the business and value we provide\xa0& help work on new business development including but not limited to developing proposals']

job title: Controls Governance and Analytics Lead - Associate
job description: ['Control Management maintains a strong and consistent control environment through a joint accountability model that aligns managers with each line of business, function and region to mitigate operational risk. The team focuses on four areas: Control Design & Expertise, Risks & Controls Identification / Assessment, Issues & Control Deficiencies and Control Governance & Reporting.', 'There is an exciting opportunity to join the regional Central Controls Office as the APAC Governance and Analytics Lead, with responsibility for providing controls-related insights for decision making by regional and location senior management. The Central Controls Office is part of the Asia CIB Control Management organization which drives the Controls agenda across the firm in the region in close partnership with regional and global teams including Lines of Business, Operations, Compliance, all Risk functions, Senior Country Business Managers and other Corporate functions.', 'The successful candidate will be a Senior Associate with a proven track record in data analytics, process automation, managing multiple projects, stakeholder management and process improvement. They will report into the Central Controls Office Lead and work closely with the global teams as well as senior leaders in the region across Legal, Compliance, Risk, Finance, Audit, HR, Technology, Operations and Business Control Managers.', 'Responsibilities', 'Review and analyze controls related data (e.g., KRI/KPI) to proactively identify operational risks trends and issues to support business-related programs and strategies', 'Maintain a strong governance structure and robust process to ensure accurate and timely reporting, and efficient delivery of change', 'Lead communication strategy, tailoring information (with sensitivity where required) to a wide variety of audiences, including APAC regional management, location management and dedicated forums/committees (e.g. HR Control Forum)', 'Engage and partner with colleagues across the firm, business, operations management, legal, compliance, risk, audit, regulatory and technology control functions to ensure that responsibilities are well understood', 'Promote a proactive risk and control culture that leverages sound change management protocols', 'Support other ad hoc activities outside projects as required', 'Qualifications:', "Bachelor's degree", 'Minimum of 5 years of experience in financial service in analytics, process automation, controls function or related functions', 'Strong written and communication skills', 'Experience with automation and data visualization tools (Alteryx, Tableau, etc)', 'Experience with data management, including the ability to manage large/complex data sets']

job description: ['Hong Kong Standards & Testing Centre', 'The Hong Kong Standards and Testing Centre Ltd. – STC was established in 1963 as Hong Kong’s first independent and not-for-profit Testing, Inspection and Certification organization. Committed to providing professional, reliable and comprehensive services, STC is accredited by HOKLAS, CNAS, DAkkS, CPSC, SATRA, LUCIDEON, JTA and MHLW, and is the first approved non-governmental laboratory undertaking CCC testing in Hong Kong and mainland China.', 'Dedicated to meeting the needs of different industries and global demands, STC soon expanded its operations and established customer service centers and state-of the-art laboratories all around the world in Asia, Europe and North America.', 'STC has gained worldwide recognition from accreditation bodies and organizations for ensuring product safety and quality compliance, issuing reliable and accurate reports, and providing exceptional customer support services. As your trusted global partner, STC is the one-stop solution for all the Testing, Inspection and Certification needs.', 'Microbiology Supervisor (Chemical, Food & Pharmaceutical Products)', 'Responsibilities:', 'To coordinate the team of technical staff to fulfill the operational activities', "To ensure proper work schedules to meet clients' needs by appropriate job allocation", 'To ensure that results of analysis are checked before admitted for reporting']

The successful candidate will be a strong team player who is able to work independently and also assist with general IT Support and systems administration as assigned.', 'DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Manage and monitor all installed systems and relevant infrastructure', 'Install, configure, test and maintain computers, servers, other hardware, operating systems, desktop images, application software and system management tools', 'Maintain security, backup, and redundancy strategies including a network-wide disaster recovery plan', 'Lead on the Implementation and operation of remote monitoring systems and endpoint security', 'Write and maintain custom scripts to increase system efficiency and lower the human intervention time on any tasks', 'Participate in the design of information and operational support systems and other related projects', 'Assist in managing the corporate systems in a racked Windows environment, including the following: Windows 2003, Windows XP, Novell Netware, DNS services, Spam filters, intrusion detection systems, Cisco Switches(desirable), VPN, firewalls and VMWare servers', '(Help Desk & AV support) Provide IT support (software & hardware) to teachers, students and parents as well as assist with AV support during school events as and when needed']

["Are you looking for a role where you can make a measurable impact on the customer experience of big brands? Do you have a curiosity for new technology? If you're interested in becoming a part of one of the fastest growing team at Emarsys, read on...", 'At Emarsys,\xa0we are always seeking exceptional talent who has a keen interest in technology and a passion for marketing. You will have the opportunity to work as part of a world class Strategic Services team in a customer- facing role where you will be encouraged to develop and grow in a fast-paced environment.', 'Successful\xa0candidates in this role will be a creative strategist and project manager who will provide advice and operational expertise to our clients. You will be customer facing, consumer data focused specialising in data- driven insight and marketing automation concept and design across multiple digital touchpoints. You will have deep understanding of complex consumer journeys, database segmentation, personal marketing, consumer lifecycle analysis and contact strategy.', 'YOUR AREA OF RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Manage client engagements and services packages while also being able to provide consultancy on the CX journey and the design of automation concept, build, performance review and next steps. Own and deliver our services packages which incorporate an element of CX program design and build in line with current capabilities.', 'Be a\xa0platform expert and work inside of a strategic roadmap, help customers to deliver lifecycle marketing automations and manage omnichannel campaigns.', 'Own\xa0account deliverables and client relationship - design of customer journeys, campaign/ program operations, overall performance reviews, account management, ensuring delivery alignment with contract terms.', 'From\xa0a platform perspective, you will be tasked with driving adoption of our Smart Insights module, predict, loyalty solution and AI capabilities across our customer base. This will be achieved via the concepting and design of automations and subsequent reporting on performance.']

job title: Consulting - Cyber Security - Cyber Governance - Senior - Hong Kong
job description: ['The opportunity', 'Cyber threats, social media, massive data storage, privacy requirements and continuity of the business as usual require heavy information security measures. As a\xa0cyber security professional t, you will lead the implementation support of security solutions for EY clients and support the clients in their desire to protect the business. You will belong to an international connected teams of professionals helping\xa0\xa0clients with their most complex information security needs and contributing toward their business resilience. You will be working with EY\xa0\xa0Advanced Security Centers to access the most sophisticated tools available to fight against cybercrime.', 'We will support you with career-long training and coaching to develop your skills. As EY is a global leading service provider in this space, you will be working with leading class talent in a collaborative environment. So whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime.', 'Your key responsibilities', 'As a Senior/Staff Associate in the Cyber Security Team, you will contribute technically to client engagements and services development activities. An important part of your role will be to actively identify , maintain and strengthen client’s relationships. You will also identify potential business opportunities for EY within existing engagements, and escalate these as appropriate. Similarly, you will anticipate and identify risks within engagements and share any issues with senior members of the team.', 'In line with EY commitment to quality, you will confirm that work is of high quality and is reviewed by the next-level reviewer. As an influential member of the team, you will help to create a positive learning culture, coach and counsel junior team members and help them to develop.']

requirement: ['To qualify for the role you must have', 'University graduate with a minimum of\xa05-6 years of relevant working experience with other Accounting/Consulting organizations as a professional; or with commercial/public sectors as part of the ESG and sustainability functions', 'Working experience in ESG /sustainability reporting and assurance, sustainability strategy are preferred. responsibility: ['Your key responsibilities', 'Work with high-growth clients and other market leaders in industries such as retail, consumer products, media & entertainment, property development and management, education, health sciences, financial services and insurance.', 'Work as part of the engagement teams in the development of efficiency and cost effectiveness out of the overall compliance landscape and the underlying Environment, Social and Governance (ESG) risk management including\xa0ESG reporting, risk assessment activities, risk transformation, ongoing governance and monitoring activities.', 'Provide service on ESG risks management for the clients who has significant ESG risk in their business and operations activities, including supply chain management, food safety management and Environment, Health and Safety (EHS) management.']
job description: ['Our Assurance group is one of the most trusted, respected and influential organizations in the industry. As part of our teams, you will provide peace of mind to clients by using your skills and experience to give companies, investors and regulators confidence in the validity of financial statements and business-critical information or processes. Groups (or, as we call them, sub-service lines) within Assurance include External Audit, Climate Change and Sustainability Services, Financial Accounting Advisory Services and Fraud Investigation & Dispute Services.', 'The opportunity', 'Our global, multidisciplinary teams equipped with a combination of experience/knowledge in assurance, tax, transactions and advisory services, works with a dedicated professional on climate change and sustainability knowledge and experience in a wide range of industries. This team combination can provide you with tailored services supported by the EY global methodologies to address issues related to your specific needs. Wherever you are in the world, EY Climate Change and Sustainability Services (EY CCaSS) can provide you with professionals equipped with the specific skills and knowledge base that you need, to support you in reaching your sustainability goals.', 'Responsibilities, Qualifications, Certifications - External']

job description: ["Ernst & Young's Financial Services (FS) Tax practice provides tax advisory, transactions and compliance services to a variety of clients in the FS market ranging from some of the world's largest multinational institutions, corporations and funds.", 'The opportunity', "As a Business Tax Services Senior Accountant, you'll make technical contributions to business tax compliance and advisory engagements. job description: ['Duties :', 'Implement campus development programmes; assist in committee work, prepare design and administrative reports; assess accommodation requirements and planning, prepare briefs for new building and renovation projects; prepare documents on technical and fee proposals, and assess the submissions; lead project teams to ensure quality standards; provide professional advice on construction alternations and renovation of facilities; prepare layout plans, architectural sketch design plans and specifications; conduct evaluation to identify project strategies and solutions; monitor project expenditures and progress to ensure timely completion; and perform any other assignments.', 'Requirements :', 'A Bachelor’s degree in Architecture or related disciplines;', 'Full membership of HKIA/similar professional bodies, with a valid safety training course certificate (commonly known as “Green Card”);', 'At least 10 years’ post-qualification management experience in design/construction/building/ structural engineering projects in Hong Kong and Mainland China;', 'Good command of written and spoken English and Chinese; and', 'Ability to complete tasks independently, self-motivation for performance enhancement, proven management and leadership ability to complete tasks within tight project schedules and good analytical and interpersonal skills are required;', 'Substantial experience in higher education institutions and/or experience in managing government subvention projects; and', 'Ability to use AutoCAD, Revit and computer graphic software are preferred.']

job description: ['Duties :', 'Implement capital development programmes and various AA&I projects; oversee building services installation; report on matters related to infrastructure and renewal, campus master plan, design standards, feasibility studies, annual capital project submissions, procurement of fixture, furniture and equipment; and perform any other assignments.', 'Requirements :', 'A Bachelor’s degree in Building Services Engineering or related disciplines and full membership of HKIE/similar professional bodies, with a valid safety training course certificate (commonly known as “Green Card”), and at least 10 years’ relevant experience.\xa0 Extensive experience in building development and large-scale building project execution in Hong Kong and Mainland China, self-motivation for performance enhancement, proven management and leadership ability to complete tasks within tight project schedules as well as good analytical and interpersonal skills are required.\xa0 Substantial experience in higher education institutions and/or experience in managing government subvention projects, and ability to use AutoCAD and Revit are preferred.', 'Shortlisted candidates will be invited for a written test.', '(Those who have responded to the previous advertisement need not re-apply.)', 'Salary and Conditions of Service', 'Remuneration package will be highly competitive, commensurate with qualifications and experience.\xa0 Appointment will be made on a fixed-term contract; fringe benefits include gratuity, leave, medical and dental schemes.', 'Information and Application']

['Company Description', "Sia Partners is a next-generation consulting firm focused on delivering superior value and tangible results to its clients as they navigate the digital revolution.\xa0With over 1,800 consultants in 17 countries, we will generate an annual turnover of USD 300 million for the current fiscal year.\xa0Our global footprint and our expertise in more than 30 sectors and services allow us to enhance our clients' businesses worldwide.", 'We guide their projects and initiatives in strategy, business transformation, IT & digital strategy, and Data Science. As the pioneer of Consulting 4.0, we develop consulting bots and integrate AI in our solutions.', 'Job Description', 'Manager in Financial Services – Banking', 'Our team in Asia is facing exciting growth, and we are looking for passionate consultants to join our team. We are currently looking for a Manager to join our Banking practice to provide strategic and operational advisory for our clients.', 'POSITION OVERVIEW', 'As a Manager, you will help to build our expertise and guarantee the quality of delivery to ensure market-leading practices for our Hong Kong office, taking into account the global nature of our organisation and our clients.', 'This will involve:', 'As part of the Banking Practice, lead and deliver project work in business strategy, regulatory compliance, risk management and operating model transformation etc. across a range of financial services clients', 'Play a key role in business development\xa0by contributing to the definition of needs and participating in commercial activities (development of pitches, responses to RFP, etc.)']

['KGA is looking for a Supply Chain Optimisation Manager to join us. The role is created to support KAS and TAS to transform its supply chain by leading projects which will enable strategic initiatives to become day-to-day operations. The initiatives will include but not limited to E2E SC data visibility; supply planning & integrated planning process; origin logistics operations optimization.', 'Job Responsibilities', 'Digitalization in Supply Chain Planning and Operations', 'Leading customer centric digital project in raising the customers’ experience and increase collaboration and integration with Kmart Group.', 'Engage, communicate, and develop effective training programs to foster the “digital mindset” and raise the adoption of digital solutions within the diverse regional and functional teams.', 'Origin Logistics Operations Process Improvement', 'Analyse current origin logistics operations and planning practices and to find out and prioritize opportunities areas.', 'Lead project team to improve both ISC planning and operations procedure, which aim to improve DIFOT, stockturns and supply chain efficiency.']

['Job Description', 'We are looking for a Software Engineer/Analyst Programmer to join our team. You will be involved in rapid prototyping and help in developing a platform to handle IoT and Big Data Analytics for major institutional bodies. In this position, we will experiment a lot with new technologies to innovate. The keywords of the job includes Mobile Apps, IoT, Big Data, Cloud Computing, AI, and ML. Are you up for the challenge to work in a vibrant and innovative company? We have multiple vacancies. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.', "What's it like", 'Join stakeholder meetings to design and shape the direction', 'Be part of a SCRUM team', 'Rapid prototype mobile apps', 'Develop Micro Services and instantly see your efforts to come to life', 'Deploy your work on Cloud environments thru DevOps', 'Touch and explore innovative IoT devices', 'Play with REAL big data, we typically deal with over 10GB of data per day', 'Get to tinker with cutting edge AI models, e.g. descriptive/predictive analytics and video analytics']

job title: Senior Officer, Policy Administrator (12 month contract)
job description: ['Purpose', 'Ensure an exceptional customer experience for our customers by managing day to day policy administrative activities, including quality checking of daily outputs, verifying data from reports to ensure quality and follow through the procedures to ensure all tasks are completed within service turnaround time. You will also be responsible for supporting outsourcing team to complete their daily tasks, working with sales, customer service or underwriting department to resolve their queries. Your individual performance will be a key contribution to the department achieving all targets for quality, productivity, compliance and regulation.', 'Accountabilities', 'Contributing with ideas to ensure the project is a success and participate in UAT deliver with a good quality', 'Gathering and analyzing requirement for UAT', 'Record and review the test result base on specifications and requirements', 'Assist Manager to review administrative forms and product-related materials, and propose to manager on necessary changes to ensure the contents are aligned with principal guidelines and processes, as well as seamless customer experiences', 'Support the assigned day to day policy administration activities independently with quality assurance compliance', 'Ensure the tasks are done within the turnaround time, by following the procedure and guideline', 'Handle and follow up enquiries within a reasonable time relating to matter such as policy issuance, subscription payment status and change of particulars etc', 'Verify data from various daily, monthly reports to ensure the accuracy rate of processing']

['Job Responsibilities', 'Responsible for network related project implementation, operation and maintenance;', 'Hands-on experience on Cisco, Palo Alto, F5 and Checkpoint, it is a plus if with hands-on experience on H3C, setup data centre, office and branch data and voice network (Avaya/MS Teams);', 'Maximize network performance by monitoring performance, troubleshooting network problems and outages, scheduling upgrades and collaborating with network architects on network optimization;', 'Install and config various network devices and services (e.g., routers, switches, firewalls, load balancers, wireless, VPN, QoS);', 'Willing to challenge the status-quo and bring new technology to enhance performance of existing network;', 'Work within established configuration and change management policies to ensure awareness, approval and success of changes made to the network infrastructure;', "Select and implement security tools, policies, and procedures in conjunction with the company's security team;", 'May in-charge on scheduled maintenance and/or support in off-hours;and', 'Liaise with vendors and other IT personnel for problem resolution.']

job title: Analyst/ Senior Analyst - Information Security, Privacy, Confidentially - Hong Kong
job description: ['Your Opportunity', 'The selected candidate will have information technology/information security background and project management skill and experience with a desire to learn more about the complex field of data protection, information security and risk. This is a full time analyst position in our Operations Team focusing on supporting the data protection assessment and risk review operations in the Asia Pacific Region and globally. You will play a key role in assisting the \xa0Data Protection Assessment Services (DPAS) Team to drive the production and approval of assessments in a global setting working with team members and technology stakeholders in the US, Europe and Asia Pacific.', 'Join us and you’ll be joining an expanding team of talented, highly motivated professionals who are making an impact that matters.', 'We encourage consideration of flexible ways of working, both formal and informal arrangements that allow for the best outcomes for our people and our clients. If this opportunity is of interest to you with some flexibility, please do discuss with us', "Work you'll do", '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support the DPAS Operations Team in Asia Pacific team by facilitating the process of DPAS assessment, documentation and approval', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Be a key point of contact of the DPAS team in the Asia Pacific region to handle internal and external stakeholder queries', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Monitor, track and manage project/assessment case intake and pipeline processing', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support and contribute to the improvement of the Asia Pacific DPAS’s process, work templates and systems used in workflow management', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Facilitate and coordinate meetings between stakeholders, technology owners and the DPAS team', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Compile operational data and management reports to inform work status, assessment quality and operational performance', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Coordinate internal team meetings, training sessions and presentation', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Assist in data protection assessments and writing documentation where required', '#LI-SMY', "A fit for the role? Let's talk about you."]

['Accelerate your career', 'Experience the latest technologies in cybersecurity solutions supporting a hybrid cloud and global network infrastructure', 'Learn and apply world-class cybersecurity tools for multi-layered defenses, vulnerability assessment, Big-data security analytics, threat hunting, detection, and response', 'Gain exposure in running a global Cyber Security Center', 'Your role', 'Keep abreast of cyber security threats and the threat landscape.\xa0 Implement multi-layered security defenses based on NIST Cyber Security Framework.\xa0 Act to detect, analyze and respond to suspicious activities and cyberattacks.\xa0 Manage and reduce risk to our customers, colleagues, partners and the company.', 'As a 2nd tier cybersecurity analyst to our 7x24 Security Operation Center.\xa0 Normal work in office hours except on call during high-priority incident response', 'Research and evaluate new technologies on cybersecurity solutions', 'Who we are looking for']

['Core C++ Developer', 'The Core team is responsible for the firm’s core exchange facing applications for market data distribution, order gateways, reference data and trade reconciliation, as well as connectivity to third party market data providers and execution platforms.', 'We are looking for a gifted C++ developer to join the Core team and support the broader trading system replacement project at Eclipse. The Core Team is part of the broader Low Latency team, which is also responsible for the firm’s automated trading and low latency exchange links, and future mobility opportunities are available for deserving candidates.', 'Responsibilities and Duties', 'Design, develop and maintain efficient and reliable C++ code for core exchange facing applications', 'Test code thoroughly, including automated testing, and actively participate in code reviews', 'Identify bugs and bottlenecks, suggest and implement improvements', 'Provide tier 3 support', 'What you offer', '3-4 years’ experience of low latency C++ development on Linux (C++ 11 or later)', 'Solid understanding of multithreading, network socket programming, and/or low-latency programming techniques', 'Strong technical design skills', 'Experience in finance domain is a plus', 'Experience with exchange connectivity is a plus', 'Experience with Kafka is a plus']

['OVERVIEW', 'The APAC Lead of Infrastructure is in a senior position reporting to the Group Chief Information Officer and is responsible for leading the IT Infrastructure teams in APAC as well as extended infrastructure suppliers globally. The Infrastructure team is a dynamic, global team designing, procuring, delivering, and supporting the production computer infrastructure to meet the substantial growth needs of Santa Fe’s business. The team is also essential in our deployment of all new equipment and upgrades to hardware and software.', 'In this role, you will be responsible for helping to deﬁne how our business purchases, supports, sunsets, and renews, our production computer systems. Along with this responsibility, you will oversee people management, work delivery, project management, product deﬁnition, and overall team health and eﬃciency. Successful candidates will possess infrastructure-based management & project management delivery experience with proven ability to motivate & build teams that are innovative, delivery-focused, and highly eﬀective.', 'Job Description', 'Work closely with Sourcing, Capacity Strategy, Data Centre Engineering, TPM, Site Reliability and other Computer peers to deliver sustainable lifecycle deployment and management strategy across infrastructure products and features.', 'Assist in managing the IT Infrastructure team across the APAC region and recommending the right level of resources supporting the business needs', 'Responsible for backup duties on data files, system and program libraries on Application, Backup, Communication and Web servers and PCs.', 'Responsible for performing period end processing on the Application, Backup, Communication and Web servers.', 'Responsible to maintain and adhere to IT policies and standards as described on ISO27001 documentations and its continue updating due to technological changes', 'Responsible to perform stock control on all IT accessories, suppliers, stationary and media']

job title: Senior Officer, Medical Underwriter (12 month contract)
job description: ['Purpose', 'This person will be responsible for making decision on underwriting. They are expected to utilize knowledge in underwriting along with logical and analytical thinking, to ensure that the applications for enrolment and/or policy changes for individual health schemes are compliant to guidelines and underwritten in a consistent and accurate manner. The purpose of the job is to ensure medical risks entering our risk pools are underwritten according to the guidelines and business rules, of Bupa delivering quality outcome, including underwriting decisions and customer services.', 'Accountabilities', 'Perform underwriting assessment on application for memberships and policy changes according to the rules and guidelines within agreed turnaround times', 'Perform reviews on more complex cases from all sales channels escalated by subordinates; prepare summary of reviews and discuss with manager to formulate solutions', 'Being familiar with the processes and guidelines, and equipped with necessary medical and underwriting knowledge to achieve reasonable and evidence-based decisions.', 'Assist manager to conduct reviews on underwriting processes and practices and to give suggestion and execute agreed strategy and tasks to upgrade system integrity, operational efficiency and effectiveness, and professionalism', 'Prepare regular and adhoc reports and interpret figures to understand any specific issues, monitor and analyze trends', 'Conduct regular audits on underwriter cases and tele-underwriting calls', 'Assist Manager to review administrative forms and product-related materials, and propose to manager on necessary changes to ensure the contents are aligned with underwriting guidelines and processes, as well as seamless customer experiences']

['Cyber threats, social media, massive data storage, privacy requirements and continuity of the service as usual require heavy information security measures. As a\xa0cyber security professional, you will help lead the implementation of cyber security and data privacy programme for EY clients and support the clients in their desire to protect the business. You will belong to an international connected team of professionals helping EY clients with their most complex information security needs and contributing toward their business resilience.', 'The opportunity', 'We will support you with career-long training and coaching to develop your skills. as the global EY network is a leading service provider in this space, you will be working with the leading collaborative environment. So whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime.', 'Responsibilities, Qualifications, Certifications', 'Participate in Cyber Security engagements with a focus on regulatory-based security assessment, implementation of data protection programme and responsible for the day to day running of the engagements', 'Work effectively as a team member, sharing responsibility, providing support, maintaining communication and updating senior team members on progress', 'Help prepare reports and schedules that will be delivered to clients and other parties', 'Develop and maintain productive working relationships with client personnel', 'Build strong internal relationships within EY Consulting Services and with other service lines across the organization', 'Skills and attributes for success', 'As a Senior Associate / Manager in the Cyber Security Team, you will contribute technically to client engagements and services development activities. An important part of your role will be to actively establish, maintain and strengthen client’s relationships. You will also identify potential business opportunities for the EY organization within existing engagements and escalate these as appropriate. Similarly, you will anticipate and identify risks within engagements and share any issues with senior members of the team.', 'In line with EY commitment to quality, you will confirm that work is of high quality and is reviewed by the next-level reviewer. As an influential member of the team, you will help to create a positive learning culture, coach and counsel junior team members and help them to develop.', 'To qualify for the role you must have', 'A broad understanding on the regulatory environment of financial services industry']

requirement: ['To qualify for the role you must have', 'Undergraduate or Masters’ Degree preferably in one of the following areas: Mathematics, Statistics, Actuarial, Engineering, Quantitative Finance, Computer Science and other related majors', 'Demonstrated leadership (thought leadership or people leadership e.g. managed project teams or direct reports)', 'Good presentation and communication skills, with a knack for explaining complex analytical concepts to people from other fields', 'Good understanding of database structure and typical data models, and applied such understanding in one of the data modelling tools: SQL and MS Access;', 'Ability to produce basic data visualization using Power BI, Tableau, or other tools;', 'In depth statistic modelling skill with ability to implement different methodologies and', 'algorithm in R or Python;', 'In depth business or financial modelling knowledge, with application (FTE project, opportunity sizing, cost and benefit analysis) in at least one of the insurance value chains (distribution, customer, underwriting, product and operations);', 'Ideally, you’ll also have']
responsibility: ['Your key responsibilities', 'Driving', 'analytics-based strategy and agenda, particularly in the insurance sector;', 'Building and help implementing strategies to revamp the insurance value chain including distribution, customer, underwriting and product;', 'Being innovative and insightful in considering', 'market entry, opportunity sizing', ', industry trends and potential disruptions;', 'Performing benchmarking researches and assessments to provide market insights for business needs', ';', 'Working', 'closely with clients, targets and other professionals', ', supporting the process of financial structuring and distressed securities strategies;', 'Developing DAT (data, analytics and technology) enablement strategy, as well as financial structuring and distressed strategy;']
job description: ['The opportunity', 'The Strategy and Transactions (SaT) teams in Asia- Pacific has been providing market leading services to clients across Greater China, ASEAN and Oceania for over 20 years. We support EY clients in the region and globally throughout the transaction lifecycle and have helped EY clients create deal value and manage transaction risks.\xa0 Similar to all service lines in EY organization, SaT operates with financial services sector focused teams and another broad industry teams.', 'FSO SaT focus on serving clients in the banking, insurance, asset management and FinTech sectors, which are highly regulated segments bringing more sector specific training and exposures.\xa0 Staff Accountants can join to support EY Asia- Pacific FSO SaT practices. In this role you will have exposure to different sub-service lines in SaT, namely Transactions and Corporate Finance (TCF) and EY- Parthenon (EY-P).', 'Transactions and Corporate Finance (TCF)', 'covers 3 sectors including Transaction Diligence (TD), Valuation, Modeling and Economics (VME) and Lead Advisory.', 'Transaction Diligence (TD)', 'advises clients on buy-side and sell-side financial and operation due diligence. We work closely with Strategy and Transactions sub-service lines and competencies, and other EY service lines to provide seamless, highly integrated due diligence to EY clients.', 'Valuation, Modeling and Economics (VME)', 'practices are the means by which we continue to bring\xa0 deep financial, economics and analytics skills to bear in order to support EY clients with better decision-making involving transactions, funding capital expansion and improving capital efficiency (such as capital allocation to help adjust risk, cash release opportunity, capital budgeting with skill sets on measuring and valuating not just assets but also litigation or life).', 'Lead Advisory', 'includes tactical and strategic advice for corporates, financial sponsors and family offices, as well as negotiation assistance and other transaction related topics.']

['Job Description', 'Support execution and project management efforts on client’s sustainability disclosure projects, including market research, strategy formation, and content creation.', 'Draft, edit, and format a variety of materials based on comprehensive research and analysis (e.g. sustainability reports and ESG disclosures, climate commitments, quantitative scoring / data models, etc.).', 'Support the development and production of client proposals and practice marketing materials.', 'Assist Business Development team to explore the sustainability disclosure market in Hong Kong and Mainland China.', 'Establishing strong working relationships with clients through project delivery.', 'Assist in mentoring, training, and integrating new teammates and interns.', 'Demonstrates a high level of integrity and asks the necessary questions to manage firm and client data responsibly', 'Qualifications', 'Undergraduate or postgraduate degree with majors in Environmental Studies, Social and Political Science, Communication, Translation, or other equivalent disciplines.', 'Proficiency in written English and written Chinese.', 'Minimum 3 years of relevant work experience in sizable company.', 'Detail-minded, strong numerical sense with high accuracy.', 'Good analytical, interpersonal, and communication skills.', 'Able to work independently and a good team player in a fast pace environment.', 'Demonstrable knowledge in carbon accounting or sustainability disclosure frameworks (HKEx ESG Reporting Guide, SASB, GRI, TCFD, CDP) preferred.']

job title: Professor / Associate Professor / Assistant Professor, Department of Political Science (Ref:21/263)
job description: ['Lingnan University', 'Professor / Associate Professor / Assistant Professor, Department of Political Science', '(Post Ref.: 21/263)', 'The Department of Political Science (', 'https://www.LN.edu.hk/polsci/', ') is committed to preparing students for a competitive and globalized working environment.\xa0 The Department combines teaching and research in the governance and public policy of Hong Kong and China, international politics, Asian international relations, and comparative politics.\xa0 It contributes with the Department of Applied Psychology, the Department of Economics and the Department of Sociology and Social Policy to the integrated Social Sciences Programme in the University, having embarked on a 4-year curriculum with a disciplinary major in political science.\xa0 Applicants are recommended to visit the Departmental website and Programme website (', 'https://www.ln.edu.hk/socsc/bsocsc', ') for more information.', 'General Requirements', 'Applicants should have a PhD degree in the relevant discipline, with relevant teaching experience and a good research record.\xa0 For appointment as Full Professor, applicants should be international well-known and have an outstanding track record in research and scholarly activities.\xa0 For appointment as Associate Professor, applicants should have at least five years of relevant experience and a sound track record in research and scholarly activities.\xa0 For appointment as Assistant Professor, applicants should have relevant teaching experience and a good research record.', 'Applicants should have excellent communication and presentation skills.\xa0 Administrative experience will be an advantage.\xa0 The appointee is expected to have a strong commitment to teaching excellence and services to the Department and the University community, and to engage actively in quality research and publication.', 'Appointment', 'The conditions of appointment will be competitive. \xa0The rank and remuneration will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.\xa0 Fringe benefits include annual leave, medical and dental benefits, mandatory provident fund, gratuity and incoming passage and baggage allowance for the eligible appointee.', 'Appointments will normally be made on an initial contract of three years, which, subject to review and mutual agreement, may lead to longer-term appointments with possibility of consideration for substantiation.']

['The Department', 'Our Racing Laboratory Department in Sha Tin undertakes various types of research and testing on horses and riders to identify the use of prohibited substances or prohibited methods.\xa0 It plays an essential role in doping control to ensure the fairness and integrity of racing and other equine sports, and is a leading laboratory in the field of equine drug testing.', 'The Job', 'You will:', 'Assist supervisor in the day-to-day office administration by carrying out assigned clerical duties.', 'Assist supervisor in managing the laboratory Drugs Database system by:', '- maintaining, disposing, updating and receipt of drug stocks', '- regularly reviewing stock level of all drug types to ensure sufficient levels are maintained to meet operational needs but no excessive quantities are stocked, to comply with the Dangerous Drugs Ordinance Cap 134', '- working with Racing Chemist (Support) or his/her delegate on drug stock discrepancies and drug quantity amendment authorisation, and performing necessary drug stock count and check']

job title: CIB Chief Data Office Controls - Data Controls Regional Lead- APAC - Executive Director
job description: ['Background', 'The CIB Chief Data Office (CDO) Controls function is a newly formed team created to support the CIB CDO, delivering on the Data Controls Strategy for the CIB inclusive of a robust governance framework underpinned by metrics & reporting.', 'Overview', 'Reporting to the CIB CDO Controls Manager, accountable to the Asia Regional Control Manager and Asia CDO Governance Lead, the successful candidate will assume regional responsibility for the delivery of the data controls agenda in region across four pillars; Risk Identification & Assessment, Control Design & Evaluation, Issues & Control Deficiencies, and Control Governance & Reporting. Supporting the CDO Governance Office in region, this role will require interaction and collaboration with Process Owners and Data Control Officers to identify data related risks relative to the business as well as perform ongoing monitoring of the Data related Operational Risk and Control environment across the CIB.', 'This role is ideal for a highly motivated individual with advanced skills in strategy, problem solving and transformation as well as strong influencing, interpersonal and communication skills. The successful candidate will have a commercial mindset and a strong background and proven ability to deliver coordinated analysis of issues and determination of business impact.', 'Responsibilities', 'Assess the effectiveness of data governance relative to programs, business processes and the direction the firm is taking relative data', 'Partner with APAC Compliance to review regulatory change, industry patterns, external events, incumbent policies & standards, etc. to proactively identify existing and emerging operational risks and issues at country and legal entity level', 'Partner with APAC Compliance to advise on local implementation; ensuring that local data management implementations in support of regulatory data-related requirements at country and legal entity level are consistent with CIB-wide data management practices and tools', 'Develop a deep understanding of Asia-specific business and regulatory nuances and related data requirements; feeding back Asia specific requirements into the development/refinement of global CIB CDO strategy and tools', 'Assess data related risks and translate into business impact, informing broader CM organisation on how to disposition', 'Design operational data controls in partnership with the Business Executive, including determining how to measure control effectiveness (e.g. metrics), providing control implementation support and performing control validation', 'Support design of application data controls, facilitating business representation at the CDA level and partnership with ISMs', 'Provide control related subject matter expertise for relevant projects driven outside of the organization', 'Contribute to the CIB CDO Control Forum and participate as Control lead in the relevant CIB controls / data governance forums in APAC']

['Due to the rapid growth of securities trading, we are looking for talented software engineers to join our dedicated IT team for managing information systems to facilitate trading in various markets, including Hong Kong, China, other foreign markets and Phillip Mart. ['Established in Asia in 2013 with a trailblazer mentality, FWD is the primary insurance business of investment group, Pacific Century Group (PCG), with minority shareholders Swiss Re Group, GIC Ventures, RRJ Capital and Hopu Investments.', 'FWD spans 10 markets in Asia including Hong Kong SAR & Macau SAR, Thailand, Indonesia, the Philippines, Singapore, Vietnam, Japan, Malaysia and Cambodia. In Hong Kong, FWD offers life and medical insurance, general insurance, employee benefits, and financial planning. We focus on creating fresh customer experiences and making the insurance journey simpler, faster and smoother, with innovative propositions and easy-to-understand products, supported by digital technology. Through this customer-led approach, FWD aims to be a leading pan-Asian insurer by changing the way people feel about insurance.', 'If you are looking for a company where can fuel your inspiration and cultivate your expertise, join us on our exciting journey.', 'The Job:', 'Create test data required to perform UAT', 'Execute UAT scripts and Document defects to support project roll-out', 'Report UAT test results and defect logs in an efficient and detail manner', 'Follow up with IT Team to resolve the defects', 'Work with different internal parties to ensure the testing is carried out correctly', 'Provide ad-hoc support when required', 'The Person:', 'Fresh Graduate or current University students, preferably from Computer Science, Finance, Actuarial, Business Administration discipline', 'Prior UAT experience and/or insurance experience is preferred']

job title: IT Security Manager (MNC; 60K x 13; CISA; CISM; CISSP; perm)
job description: ['The IT Security Manager is in charge of implementing the Cybersecurity agenda of the company by assessing, detecting, enforcing, preventing, remediating and monitoring. The candidate to this position will implement the security policy and procedure, and ensure the IT operations are performed in accordance with it. responsibility: ['The position holder is responsible and accountable for (but not limited to) the following:', 'Manage environmental data collection, validation, and analysis across all TAL’s factories on a quarterly basis.', 'Supports the Environmental Sustainability Director in the development and improvement of TAL’s Environmental Management System through data review, research, writing, and training of the TAL factories during the management system implementation.', 'Enhance TAL internal environmental performance tools to help identify performance improvement opportunities (i.e. visuals, graphs, charts, tables, and dashboards).', 'Contribute to the Sustainability Team’s communications on the sustainability performance for the Group, factories, and TAL’s biennial sustainability report.', 'Assist factories in preparing and submitting Higg Index data, including training and verification of data.', 'Promotes environmental awareness internally, develop training on environmental topics, and work with cross‐functional teams as needed to support the Group’s strategy.', 'Participate and advise on customer related sustainability queries, including but not limited to audits, requests for information, customer sustainability initiatives, certifications, etc.', 'Job Requirements', 'Strong passion for environmental sustainability and desire for solving sustainability challenges in a business context.', 'Minimum of two years environmental sustainability experience, environmental auditing experience is a plus.', 'Required tertiary education with strong preference for tertiary education related to environmental sustainability (i.e. environmental science, environmental policy, environmental management, sustainable business, etc.)', 'Good analytical and problem‐solving ability', 'High commitment to quality and detail oriented']

recognized leader in environmental sustainability in the garment industry.', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'The position holder is responsible and accountable for (but not limited to) the following:', improvement of TAL’s Environmental Management System through data review, research, writing, and training of the TAL factories during the management system implementation.', 'Enhance TAL internal environmental performance tools to help identify performance improvement opportunities (i.e. visuals, graphs, charts, tables, and dashboards).', 'Contribute to the Sustainability Team’s communications on the sustainability performance for the Group, factories, and TAL’s biennial sustainability report.', 'Assist factories in preparing and submitting Higg Index data, including training and verification of data.', 'Promotes environmental awareness internally, develop training on environmental topics, and work with cross‐functional teams as needed to support the Group’s strategy.', 'Participate and advise on customer related sustainability queries, including but not limited to audits, requests for information, customer sustainability initiatives, certifications, etc.', 'Job Requirements', 'Strong passion for environmental sustainability and desire for solving sustainability challenges in a business context.', 'Minimum of two years environmental sustainability experience, environmental auditing experience is a plus.']

['Summary', 'The successful candidate will participate in a Digital Transformation Project for the largest telecommunications company in Hong Kong – by transforming the legacy systems through the latest digital solution on agile architecture to support the next generation of CRM & Billing systems.\xa0 The new CRM & Billing Systems will provide the first class Customer Experience via innovative functions and features.', 'Job Duties', 'The candidate will be responsible for defining software frameworks, development methods and tools to support advanced digital solutions.\xa0 He / She will be involved in developing application software and supporting frameworks with the following scope of duties:', 'Design and architect the end-to-end BSS solutions, including integration with other systems such as CRM, Campaign Management, Customer Data Platform, Customer Order Management, Customer Information Management, Customer 360 View, Product Catalog, Resource Management, etc.', 'Build and cultivate relationship with stakeholders including users and \xa0senior technical individuals from both development teams and user groups', 'Act as a technical liaison between users, technical teams and support', 'Work with solution architect and business analyst to design the solution from scratch, including building core components, business processes, data model, integration points with other company name: Health and Happiness (H&H) Hong Kong Limited
job description: ['A bit about us', 'Health & Happiness (H&H) Group is a publicly traded company,\xa0with established market positions in more than 14 countries in Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America and Oceania with over 3,400 team members working across the globe. Our vision is focused on premium nutrition and lifetime wellness, backed by science. We\xa0have 3 business segments – Baby, Adult and Pet Nutrition and Care – supporting whole-family health and happiness across 8 international brands.', 'On our journey to making a positive difference across the world, you will work with passionate people in an innovative and collaborative organisation as we inspire wellness through\xa0#PurposeLedCareers!', 'We are passionate about our customers and community and are looking for similar-minded talent to join us!\xa0As an equal opportunity employer,\xa0we care deeply about creating an inclusive workplace where our team members feel valued, respected, and empowered', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Provide daily legal support on sale of goods, consumer protection, trademark, data protection, competition.', 'Support commercial and contract issues across the business in Hong Kong and Asia.', 'Assist in drafting and reviewing commercial agreements (trading, purchasing, supply, distribution agreements, etc.).', 'Assist in legal entity governance matters, including company secretarial tasks.', 'Manage external counsel and local legal budget where appropriate.']

['Summary', 'The successful candidate will be one of the key contributors to the Digital Transformation Project for the largest telecommunications company in Hong Kong. He/she gets to work with a team of highly skilled technologists to transform the telco legacy systems into the Digital Platform supporting the best-in-class Customer Experience.', 'Job Duties', 'Responsible for defining the software frameworks, development methods and tools to support the advanced digital solutions as part of a large-scale application development project and contributing to the overall direction of the solution and the design. The incumbent is accountable for leading the architecture design to guiding the design implementation for the various components making up the solution. The incumbent will be involved in running the design deliberations with the product owners, scrum teams and business architects and is expected to hold relevant architectural and design spikes to clarify and complete the design of the product.', 'Responsible for maintaining the long-term architecture roadmap of the product and be part of the team with the product owners to assess and define the features for each sprint. The incumbent will be seen as the technology advocate and will be expected to participate in the scrum meetings to provide guidance/assistance to the development resources. He/she will be involved in the following scope of duties:', 'Design and architect the end-to-end BSS/OSS solutions, including integration with other systems such as CRM, Campaign Management, Customer Data Platform, Customer Order Management, Customer Information Management, Customer 360 View, Product Catalog, Resource Management, etc.', 'Design solution from scratch, including building core components, business processes, data model, integration points with other systems, interface definition and protocol.\xa0 Define related implementation and migration plans considering all functional and non-functional requirements such as access management, security, disaster recovery, reporting requirements, etc.', 'Manage the design of Epics, User Stories and the agreed MVP for the respective releases and provide a roadmap of those designs before the relevant sprint', 'Manage the overall solution from a technical perspective and support the technical design and technical testing by providing guidelines and assistance to enable solution development and implementation', 'Expected to be hands-on and be involved in the day to day development and running of the design sprints that will be organised for the various product components', 'The Person', 'The successful candidate should have extensive working experience with designing and implementing end-to-end BSS/OSS components in a systems integrator capacity.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related disciplines', 'A minimum of 10 years experience in the IT profession', 'Strong experience in BSS and/or OSS systems, processes and software solutions in ONE of the following specialised areas;']

['Applications are invited for appointment as', 'Post-doctoral Fellow in the Department of Psychiatry', '(Ref.: 508368), to commence as soon as possible for two to three years.', 'Applicants should possess a doctoral degree by research in psychology, social sciences, public health, sociology, statistics or related disciplines, with an excellent publication track record.\xa0 They should have a strong quantitative background, relevant post-doctoral experience in conducting and managing community research and clinical studies, and demonstrated expertise in the analysis of datasets.\xa0 They should also have the ability to work independently and in collaboration with a multidisciplinary team, the ability to collaborate with external parties including academics and social service groups, and excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Chinese.', 'The appointee will participate in an ethnic minority mental health pilot project with an aim to evaluate the effectiveness of mental health counselling for the ethnic minority in the Hong Kong community.\xa0 He/She will manage the evaluation component of the project, liaise with project sites for data acquisition, write academic papers, train and supervise research staff, and perform other duties as assigned.\xa0 Those who have responded to the previous advertisement (Ref.: 504691) need not re-apply.', 'A highly competitive salary commensurate with qualifications and experience will be offered, in addition to annual leave and medical benefits.', 'The University only accepts online application for the above post.\xa0 Applicants should apply online and upload an up-to-date C.V.\xa0 Review of applications will start as soon as possible and continue until', 'November 17', ', 2021', ', or until the post is filled, whichever is earlier.']

['The Department', 'The IT Strategy and Governance Department drives new strategies for overall IT Planning including manpower planning, demand and supply management, IT budgets and financial planning. It is responsible for the design and governance of the Enterprise Architecture, the management of the Project Management Office and resourcing from the IT Shenzhen Development Center. In addition, it manages the strategic relationship with business users and external partners to foster customer focus and collaboration.', 'The Job', 'You will:', 'Collaborate with business users and technology leaders to define and implement a data centric strategy to modernize Services in line with the defined EA roadmap', 'Creation of architectural design proposals and prepare architecture reports for management and executive teams.', 'Recommend solutions to improve new and existing systems.', 'Educate staff members through training and individual support.', 'Conduct regular and ad-hoc reviews on every architecture component for different enterprise systems.', 'Prepare technical reports and deliver presentations to all levels of management to delineate the business implications of technical initiatives and secure their buy-in.', 'Drive and promote architectural standards and policies.', 'Provide architecture advice and assistance, usually definitive, to all levels of engineers and managers.', 'Participate and contribute positively to create a diverse and inclusive culture with trust and respect. Play an active role to support cross team/division/department efforts and model collaborative behaviours.', 'About You', 'You should have:']

job title: Mainland Affairs Support Manager (Policy & Stakeholders Engagement)
job description: ['The Department', "The Mainland Affairs Department (Policy & Stakeholders Engagement) is responsible for strategic liaison and engagement with Mainland stakeholders in both governmental and nongovernmental sectors through a wide range of programmes, events and platforms with a view to supporting the Club's operations and development in the Mainland. The department also keeps track of policies, measures and regulations pertaining to the Club's operations and development in the Mainland and identifies potential challenges and opportunities.", "Reporting to the Mainland Affairs Manager, the job holder is supporting the project management of the Club's social betterment initiatives in the Mainland, assisting the development of communication strategies, plans and tools to promote the Club’s best practices, and helping the enhancement of community relations, particularly with the philanthropy sector in the Mainland.", "He / She is also expected to assist the Manager to devise engagement plans and collaborative programs with HK-based Mainland authorities to develop sustainable and amicable working relationship which facilitates the Club's initiatives in the Mainland.", 'The Job', 'You will:', "Oversee and support the preparation and implementation of the Club's Mainland social betterment initiatives by developing project plans/vetting proposals, collaborating with partners, monitoring the progress and evaluating the outcomes.", 'Help to steer the direction, monitor the progress and budget spending, as well as evaluate the effectiveness of the social betterment initiatives in the Mainland.', 'Help manage funding applications and implementation of social betterment initiatives end to end, including but not limited to due diligence, assessment and research, Committee paper writing, project implementation and related event management.', 'Provide secretarial support for the working groups of the social betterment initiatives, including preparation of meeting materials, drafting of papers and reports, logistic arrangements.', "Analyze and monitor social and policy developments in both Hong Kong and the Mainland and provide insights and recommendations for the Club's management."]

['OVERVIEW', 'The APAC Lead of Infrastructure is in a senior position reporting to the Group Chief Information Officer and is responsible for leading the IT Infrastructure teams in APAC as well as extended infrastructure suppliers globally. The Infrastructure team is a dynamic, global team designing, procuring, delivering, and supporting the production computer infrastructure to meet the substantial growth needs of Santa Fe’s business. The team is also essential in our deployment of all new equipment and upgrades to hardware and software.', 'In this role, you will be responsible for helping to deﬁne how our business purchases, supports, sunsets, and renews, our production computer systems. Along with this responsibility, you will oversee people management, work delivery, project management, product deﬁnition, and overall team health and eﬃciency. Successful candidates will possess infrastructure-based management & project management delivery experience with proven ability to motivate & build teams that are innovative, delivery-focused, and highly eﬀective.', 'Job Description', 'Work closely with Sourcing, Capacity Strategy, Data Centre Engineering, TPM, Site Reliability and other Computer peers to deliver sustainable lifecycle deployment and management strategy across infrastructure products and features.', 'Assist in managing the IT Infrastructure team across the APAC region and recommending the right level of resources supporting the business needs', 'Responsible for backup duties on data files, system and program libraries on Application, Backup, Communication and Web servers and PCs.', 'Responsible for performing period end processing on the Application, Backup, Communication and Web servers.', 'Responsible to maintain and adhere to IT policies and standards as described on ISO27001 documentations and its continue updating due to technological changes', 'Responsible to perform stock control on all IT accessories, suppliers, stationary and media']

job title: Assistant Operations Support Manager - HSBC Broking Services
job description: ['The health and safety of our employees and candidates is very important to us. Due to the current situation related to the Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV), we’re leveraging our digital capabilities to ensure we can continue to recruit top talent at HSBC. \xa0As your application progresses, you may be asked to use one of our digital tools to help you through your recruitment journey.\xa0\xa0If so, one of our Resourcing colleagues will explain how our video-interviewing technology will be used throughout the recruitment process and will be on hand to answer any questions you might have.', 'Some careers have more impact than others.', 'If you’re looking for a career where you can make a real impression, join HSBC and discover how valued you’ll be. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.', 'Broking Services provides full investment services in stocks, bonds, currencies, precious metals, commodities and derivatives to retail, corporate customers and financial intermediaries. As a leading full service broker dealer in Hong Kong, our investment services include advisory, execution, risk and portfolio management, custodianship, and margin financing.', 'We are currently seeking a high calibre professional to join our team as an', 'Assistant Operations Support Manager.']

company name: Elite Partners Risk Advisory Services Limited
job description: ['In the world of raising awareness of the fragility and inter-connectedness of all of us, sustainability goes beyond elaborated slogans and pretty charts. At Elite Partners, we are committed to bring positive changes and to advocate these notions.', 'Job Description', 'We are seeking a motivated and dynamic ESG Advisory Consultant\xa0to join our growing sustainability advisory services practice.\xa0In this entry-level, client-facing role, you will work directly with senior consultants to provide support on client engagements such as reviewing ESG (environmental, social and governance) data, ratings and rankings, and goal-setting for finance sector clients.', 'This is an excellent opportunity for a junior professional looking to work with an expert consulting team on interesting ESG projects for a wide range of HKEX listed corporations — helping them achieve positive and tangible social, environmental, and economic impact.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Conduct desk-based bench marking and research on clients, industries, and market trends. Analyze client documentation and identify improvement opportunities (gap analysis).', 'Synthesize research findings into key themes, analyze information to develop conclusions and draft recommendations for client deliverables.', 'Support the development of corporate sustainability reports, including outlining, writing, editing, and proofreading content and other client communications.']

['Cyber threats, social media, massive data storage, privacy requirements and continuity of the service as usual require heavy information security measures. As a\xa0cyber security professional, you will help lead the implementation of cyber security and data privacy programme for EY clients and support the clients in their desire to protect the business. You will belong to an international connected team of professionals helping EY clients with their most complex information security needs and contributing toward their business resilience.', 'The opportunity', 'We will support you with career-long training and coaching to develop your skills. as the global EY network is a leading service provider in this space, you will be working with the leading collaborative environment. So whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime.', 'Responsibilities, Qualifications, Certifications', 'Participate in Cyber Security engagements with a focus on regulatory-based security assessment, implementation of data protection programme and responsible for the day to day running of the engagements', 'Work effectively as a team member, sharing responsibility, providing support, maintaining communication and updating senior team members on progress', 'Help prepare reports and schedules that will be delivered to clients and other parties', 'Develop and maintain productive working relationships with client personnel', 'Build strong internal relationships within EY Consulting Services and with other service lines across the organization', 'Skills and attributes for success', 'As a Senior Associate / Manager in the Cyber Security Team, you will contribute technically to client engagements and services development activities. An important part of your role will be to actively establish, maintain and strengthen client’s relationships. You will also identify potential business opportunities for the EY organization within existing engagements and escalate these as appropriate. Similarly, you will anticipate and identify risks within engagements and share any issues with senior members of the team.', 'In line with EY commitment to quality, you will confirm that work is of high quality and is reviewed by the next-level reviewer. As an influential member of the team, you will help to create a positive learning culture, coach and counsel junior team members and help them to develop.', 'To qualify for the role you must have', 'A broad understanding on the regulatory environment of financial services industry']

['Research Assistant II in the Department of Medicine', '(Ref.: 508706) (to commence as soon as possible for one year, with the possibility of renewal subject to satisfactory performance)', 'Applicants should possess a Bachelor’s degree in Biological/Medical Sciences or a related discipline.\xa0 They should have a good command of spoken and written English and Chinese (including Cantonese); a strong sense of responsibility; good organizational skills; and the abilities to multitask and work independently as well as in a team.', 'The appointee will assist in research work including contacting patients/research study participants, data management, and performing basic laboratory works such as DNA extraction and targeted PCR.', 'Those who have responded to the previous advertisement (Ref.: 508325) need not re-apply.', 'A highly competitive salary commensurate with qualifications and experience will be offered, in addition to annual leave and medical benefits.', 'The University only accepts online application for the above post.\xa0 Applicants should apply online and upload an up-to-date C.V.\xa0 Review of applications will start on November 7, 2021 and continue until', 'November 24, 2021', ',', 'or until the post is filled, whichever is earlier.']

['Your New Role:', 'The successful candidate will be responsible for developing innovative products for Now TV, and managing enhancements, performance and quality of existing products including video-on-demand, interactive services and Now Player.', 'You will take full responsibility for the whole product development cycle. You have to lead various technical parties and business teams on product development including feasibility study, user interface, service / product design, vendor / solution evaluation, business requirement analysis, technical requirement specifications, testing and budget control with the prime objective to meet business targets, drive shorter time to market and deliver better quality of services.', 'You are required to coordinate with multiple operation and supporting teams to define workable process and efficient practice and procedures for day-to-day operations of related products and services.', 'You are also required to develop business acumen and strong technical knowledge in applying various technologies to real products and identifying opportunities for new product and infrastructure in the long- term benefits of the business.', 'What makes you succeed:', 'Degree holder in Information Technology, Computer Science, Information Engineering, or related disciplines.', 'At least 5-8 years of solid experience in software/mobile apps development; relevance in Internet, multimedia, telecom, TV or new media business is an advantage.', 'Experience in large-scale system analysis and architectural design. Technical knowledge in data analysis, networking, client / server software or cloud computing technologies is an advantage.', 'Excellent leadership, project management and interpersonal skills, self-motivated and result-oriented with strong analytical thinking.', 'Willing to learn and able to work under pressure.', 'Good command of spoken and written English and Chinese.', 'Candidate with less experience will be considered for Senior Product Development Executive.', 'Want to be one of us?', 'We offer attractive & competitive salary and benefits, an exciting work environment and excellent career development opportunities.\xa0If you have the desire for an exciting and rewarding career, please send us your resume,\xa0stating your present and expected salary to Human Resources Department by clicking "Apply Now"']
