['At UL, we know why we come to work.', 'Thousands of us around the world wake up every day with a common purpose: to make the world a safer, more secure and sustainable place. Science is in our DNA; we are endlessly curious and passionate about seeking and speaking the truth. We take delight in knowing that our work makes a meaningful contribution to society, and we are proud that our culture is centered on integrity, collaboration, inclusion and excellence. UL stands at the forefront of technological advancement, and we are continually challenged to find new ways to foster innovation and positive change. Satisfying? Yes. Exciting? Absolutely!', 'What You’ll Learn & Achieve', 'Under minimal supervision, sets up and performs a variety of tests within areas of responsibility where basic knowledge of the underlying scientific and engineering fundamentals is required. Provides feedback regarding tests and data sheets. May plan tests, evaluate test results and report opinions and interpretations.', 'Conducts scheduled equipment verification and calibration in a timely manner in accordance with ISO/IEC 17025:2017.', 'Evaluates and examines calibration certificates from external parties.', 'Communicates with external suppliers and arranges calibration, inspection, repair and maintenance works and provides feedback.', 'Equipment trouble shooting and problem solving.', 'Builds and/or adapts setup and test equipment to new situations, based on data sheets and instructions from engineering department personnel.', 'Operates designated machines and special laboratory equipment. Performs routine maintenance of designated test equipment and laboratory area.', 'Communicates and works closely with internal users to schedule and coordinate support functions and provides supporting service to the customers.', 'Integrates continuous improvement concepts and techniques into all aspects of the job.', 'Performs other duties as directed. What Makes You a Great Fit', 'Higher Diploma or Degree in Electronics / Electrical Engineering or other related disciplines.', 'Basic Knowledge in HOKLAS / ISO/IEC 17025:2017 is an advantage.', 'Fluent in written and spoken English and Mandarin.', 'Strong communication and problem solving skills.', '2 years working experience in related field. What You’ll Experience Working At UL', 'Mission:', 'For UL, corporate and social responsibility isn’t new. Making the world a safer, more secure and sustainable place has been our business model for the last 125 years and is deeply engrained in everything we do. People: Ask any UL employee what they love most about working here, and you’ll almost always hear, “the people.” Going beyond what is possible is the standard at UL. We’re able to deliver the best because we employ the best.', 'Interesting work:', 'Every day is different for us here as we eagerly anticipate the next innovation that our customers’ create. We’re inspired to take on the challenge that will transform how people live, work and play. And as a global company, in many roles, you will get international experience working with colleagues around the world.']

['At\xa0Forte, we’re building economic technology for games. Our end-to-end platform enables the emergence of community economics, a system where the interests of game developers and players are aligned, leading to healthier, sustainable game communities. Our team is composed of longtime industry members (Unity, ngmoco, Riot Games, Electronic Arts, Sony, and Rockstar Games, among others), and is currently working with over 20 acclaimed game developers from across the industry to reimagine the economics of games. We\xa0recently raised $185M\xa0in our Series A, and we’re looking for top talent to join our growing team.', 'As a', 'Director of Economy Optimization', ', you will play a key role in the growth of Forte.\xa0As part of a lean and ambitious organization, you will work cross-functionally with different teams to monitor, evaluate and optimize the performance of the entire portfolio of partner game titles, on an on-going basis.\xa0Your passion for gaming and analytical skills will enable you to dive deeply into individual games to identify opportunities which stand to improve both the player experience and developer outcomes.', 'You are excited to gain exposure to a wide range of different problem spaces -- spanning token economics, game design, tech, business strategy. As a member of the Business Operations & Token Economics team, you are comfortable analyzing user, economic and feature data. Strong candidates possess exceptional business judgement and communication skills to deliver consistent, high quality outcomes.', 'Requirements', 'In this role, you will...', 'Analyze the market economies of specific Forte games - diving deeply into the ecosystems and designs of games to understand user behaviour', 'Based on macro trends and behaviours of key user segments, identify opportunities to improve the experience of players (in specific games and across the entire platform) and token economy outcomes', 'Present data-driven insights and recommendation to internal/external stakeholders and the leadership team', 'Collaborate with the Game Partnerships team to convey and explain economic concepts to game development partners', 'Partner with different teams - such as Games Partnerships, Product, Business Operations & Token Economics - to build out the analytics infrastructure of Forte', 'To be a good fit, you have…', 'Minimum of 8 years of progressive analytical work experience (BA/BS in Economics, Business, Math,Engineering or a related field)', 'Proven ability to draw insights via thoughtful analysis of large user data sets (ideally in consumer internet applications of game themselves)', 'A proven track record of leading engagements', 'A passion for gaming: as a business and an entertainment product', 'Understanding of monetization/retention gaming systems coupled with curiosity to explore game data - in search of opportunities / issues']

['Job Function', 'Under general supervision, independently manages execution and timely completion of basic engineering projects by analyzing project scope and determining project specifications, establishing test programs for product investigations, analyzing test programs for adequacy and sequence, examining samples for compliance and preparing reports for clients. Assists in the development of test methods, and test equipment. Exercises Project Handler Signature Authority as Project Handler of record responsible for opening, maintenance, completion, and closing of assigned new work engineering projects. May exercise Review Signature Authority as assigned as Reviewer of record responsible for initial review, status review, and final technical review of all new work engineering projects.', 'Job Responsibilities', 'Determines project scope, develops a preliminary plan of investigation, and determines project specifications such as cost, time, and sample requirements by analyzing client input, available supplemental data, and product construction. Projects may include travel to conduct or witness tests at client sites.', 'Initiates communication with clients to promote and explain the benefits of new and existing services. Follows up on contacts from clients. Communicates with clients to discuss technical issues, explain UL procedures and requirements, convey project cost, and negotiate completion date and sample requirements. Acts to address client concerns and to resolve client issues. Provides technical assistance to clients in reference to product inspection and follow-up services.', "Establishes appropriate test programs by reviewing files and manufacturer's information, examining samples, and applying UL requirements. Is familiar with applicable standards, company manuals and appropriate technical literature. Examines samples for compliance with UL requirements and notifies client of any areas in which the product is not in compliance or of any changes in project scope or specifications.", 'Coordinates laboratory activities by preparing data sheets and instructions to technicians, scheduling and reviewing work of laboratory technicians and engineering support staff, and establishing completion dates. Coordinates administrative aspects of project management. Serves as Project Handler of record and may sign as Reviewer of record as assigned.', 'Communicates project status and results to clients through frequent contact and by preparing reports. Prepares Follow-Up Service Procedures and information pages.', 'Integrates continuous improvement concepts and techniques into all aspects of the job.', 'Resolves engineering issues associated with Variation Notices by analyzing and reporting on the acceptability of the variations.', 'Assists in the development of UL requirements. Assists in developing special test methods and test equipment. Analyzes test program for adequacy and sequence. May coordinate and/or perform File Reviews, as directed. May represent UL at industry related functions such as seminars and trade shows.', 'Performs other duties as directed.', 'Job Requirements', 'Degree in Product Testing/ Electronic Engineering/ Electrical Engineering/ Mechanical Engineering/Engineering Technology /Science or above with 2-4 years’ relevant experience;', 'Experience in Small Appliances product safety standards, IEC60335 series testing and laboratory experience is required;', 'Good command of spoken and written English and Mandarin is essential;', 'Strong sense of customer focus, good interpersonal and communication skills;']

job description: ['Reference #:\xa0CEO/CEO/MSO/2794/211020', 'Job Responsibilities', 'Reporting to CEO, you will be accountable to:', 'Drive ASTRI’s overall strategy in the Greater Bay Area (GBA) and direct the wholly-owned subsidiary in Shenzhen to capitalize on collaboration and development opportunities.', 'Collaborate with partners in GBA to promote ASTRI’s latest technological innovations in the contexts of the cities’ relative strengths and advantages, and to enhance the brand and reputation of ASTRI through marketing events, showcases, and exhibitions.', 'Lead efforts to help Hong Kong players establish and develop technology-based industries in GBA and drive collaborations on commercialization.', 'Attract enterprises in the mainland to set up businesses/ research centres and invest in R&D projects in Hong Kong, through collaborations and joint applications for funding justification.', 'Drive and carry out ASTRI’s applied R&D and collaboration efforts in GBA through the R&D projects under the five focused initiatives.', 'Fortify strategic alliance with business and technology partners, universities, and R&D institutes in GBA to facilitate knowledge transfer and bolster ASTRI’s regional influence.', 'Cultivate commercialization leads and build strategic partnerships in GBA to realize sustainable values of ASTRI and Hong Kong.']

job title: Senior Security & Quality Assurance Analyst / Security & Quality Assurance Analyst
job description: ['[Ref: SSQAA/SQAA]', 'The Job', 'Lead and supervise the team on information security projects implementation.', 'Assist in identifying potential security risk and improvement area to recommending the most appropriate mitigation plan or training.', 'Develop skills of the various techniques in application security.', 'Support solution review processes and perform quality assurance in application perspective.', 'Perform data analysis to establish any business cases or reports.', 'Communicate with non-IT security internal staff to apply the most appropriate IT security controls to protect our company data.', 'Validate information security controls effectiveness and agreed deliverables to assure security standards/plans are achieved.', 'The Person', 'Degree holder in Information Technology, Computer Science or related disciplines with relevant qualification in information security preferred.', 'At least 8 years’ experience in IT or information system management, of which at least 5 years in information security or risk management related area in corporations or a sizeable organization.', 'Extensive experience in designing security architecture (e.g. application authentication), IAM/SSO, or mobile application security to achieve high standard of security requirement.', 'Good command of both spoken and written Chinese and English.', 'Knowledge in IT-business applications, information security risk management and Cloud computing.']

['At Vyond, our mission is to put the power of video in the hands of everyone. Vyond allows people of all skill levels in all industries and job roles to create dynamic and powerful media. With features that go beyond moving text and images, you can build character-driven stories or compelling data visualizations that engage audiences and deliver results.', 'Founded as GoAnimate in 2007, Vyond has helped Global 2000 organizations, small businesses, and individuals produce more than 30 million videos.', 'With offices in Silicon Valley, Hong Kong, and Taiwan, Vyond employs a team of people whose creativity extends well beyond our office walls. We are passionate about the power of video and how it makes the static dynamic and transforms the mundane into the captivating.', 'VYOND™ is a trademark of GoAnimate, Inc.', 'Description', 'Senior Engineer (Growth) assists the Product Team by creating tools, technology, interfaces and data pipelines to help our product reach even more users. This is an exciting role that will let you change the product in subtle, but powerful ways. If you like experimenting with product features and finding answers in the data then this job is for you!', 'Responsibilities', 'Monitor KPIs such as engagement, churn and growth, down to the feature level.', 'Work with different internal teams to find potential areas for customer growth.', 'Analyse data, find important patterns and suggest ways to improve the product across all touch points.', 'Collaborate with Engineering, Finance, Billing, Product and Data teams to prepare functional & technical documentation.', 'Design, code and run A/B tests, then report actual performance against predicted values.', 'Requirements', 'Degree in Computer Science or related field.', 'Technical proficiency on Node.js and ReactJS.', 'Experience with UX patterns and UI coding.', 'Familiar with RESTful API design and implementation.', 'Familiar with database design and operation.', 'Experience in subscription management systems is an advantage.']

['The Job', 'Ensure the smooth implementation and timely support of IT services to business and IT organisation on Windows server infrastructure, Corporate network, IP Telephony system and wireless network.', 'Co-ordinate with user departments and external consultants to define system needs and perform system design for implementing and maintaining network related IT services such as Active Directory, ADFS, and Windows Server according to the Project Management standards.', 'Conduct feasibility studies and recommend most cost effective IT solutions to improve business process and reduce operational cost.', 'Perform vendor and contract management during the procurement and implementation of IT products and services. Rate and report the quality including reliability, security, system documentation and performance of computer applications/services.', 'Work according to quality and security standards, policies and procedures while maintaining the reliability and availability of related IT services.', 'Provide technical guideline and assistance to server, network and Service Desk support team to carry out their functions in a professional and customer focused manner.', 'The Person', 'Degree holder in Information Technology, Computer Science or related disciplines.']

requirement: ['A qualified accountant with a degree in Accounting or Finance;', '5 years’ experience in general financial accounting. Experience in accounts payable is desired;', 'Proficient in ERP software and MS Office, including Excel, Word and PowerPoint, is preferred;', 'Be number sensitive and attentive to details;', 'Good interpersonal and communication skills;', 'Candidates with less experience can be considered for the post of Assistant Accountant.', 'Thank you for your interest in a career with CK Life Sciences.\xa0Competitive compensation and benefits package will be offered to the right candidate.\xa0We operate a 5-day workweek, and our benefits cover retirement, health and life.\xa0Regular shuttle bus service is also provided with pick-ups and drop-offs at designated and convenient locations.', 'To apply for our position, you should write, enclosing a current resume to', 'Chief Manager,\xa0Human Resources & Administration, CK Life Sciences Limited, 2 Dai Fu Street, Tai Po Industrial Estate, Hong Kong', 'or by clicking the', 'APPLY NOW', 'button.\xa0For more company information, please visit\xa0www.ck-lifesciences.com.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all qualified candidates.\xa0 Personal data collected will be treated in strictest confidence and handled confidentially by authorized personnel for recruitment-related purposes within the Group.']

Experience in accounts payable is desired;', 'Proficient in ERP software and MS Office, including Excel, Word and PowerPoint, is preferred;', 'Be number sensitive and attentive to details;', 'Good interpersonal and communication skills;', 'Candidates with less experience can be considered for the post of Assistant Accountant.', 'Thank you for your interest in a career with CK Life Sciences.\xa0Competitive compensation and benefits package will be offered to the right candidate.\xa0We operate a 5-day workweek, and our benefits cover retirement, health and life.\xa0Regular shuttle bus service is also provided with pick-ups and drop-offs at designated and convenient locations.', 'To apply for our position, you should write, enclosing a current resume to', 'Chief Manager,\xa0Human Resources & Administration, CK Life Sciences Limited, 2 Dai Fu Street, Tai Po Industrial Estate, Hong Kong', 'or by clicking the', 'APPLY NOW', 'button.\xa0For more company information, please visit\xa0www.ck-lifesciences.com.']

['[Ref: CES-SO(ES)]', 'The Job:', 'Assist in manage the overall operation and administration of the estate-based social support services and Elderly Lounges.', 'Assist in service delivery including to enhance the social capital, to deliver counseling and case management, to provide social activities and volunteer services, to provide support to the property management staff, and to visit all tenants in elderly flats and assisted-living flats.', 'Assist in coordinating with the Estate Management Offices and Occupational therapists for on-going facility improvement and home modification at respective rental estates.', 'Assist in liaising and coordinating with collaborators from planning to implementation of activities, programs and groups to promote home safety, health and social care to meet with various needs of elderly tenants.', 'Assist in monitoring site management such as cleaning and maintenance, inventory and procurement, report and statistic, program planning and evaluation.', 'Handle daily requests, enquiries and complaints of the elderly tenants and on site coordination between internal and external parties; in case of any emergency, determine prompt action with the contingency plan to ensure safety for the elderly tenants.', 'Provide guidance and arrange duties for S4 / O4 to ensure the service quality and standard of estate-based social support services.', 'Undertake any other duties as assigned by the direct supervisor deems appropriate.', 'The Person:', 'Diploma holder or above in social work / health science with minimum 3-5 years’ post qualification working experience in recognized welfare organization of elderly service; community services is preferable.', 'Good manner, self-motivated and able to work independently.', 'Sensitive to interpersonal relations with good communication skill.', 'Good command of both written and spoken English and Chinese.']

['Key Roles and Responsibilities', 'Sampling and testing of raw materials, in-process materials and finished products.', 'Perform test methods and equipment calibration.', 'Maintain documentation system in compliance with GMP requirements.', 'Ad hoc activity as assigned.', 'Qualifications and Experience', 'Higher Diploma or above of Science (Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry, Chemical Technology) or related subjects.', 'Familiar with GMP is an advantage.', 'Hardworking, self-initiative, organized and able to work independently.']

['Role Introduction', 'Reports to:', 'Digital & Analytics Manager', 'You are passionate about customer experience, you think that Virtual assistants will be the cornerstone of the customer experience strategy in the coming years.', 'We are looking for a Squad Lead to drive the development of our B2C Virtual Assistants. You will be joining the Customer Care department as well as the B2C Virtual Assistant Agile Squad.', 'You will be working in a fast-paced, Agile & always-changing environment to deliver exceptional conversation flows for our various Virtual Assistants: Chatbot for LiveChat, Whatsapp, Facebook, Wechat but also Voicebot for our customers calling our hotlines around the world.', 'You will be driving the capabilities of our Virtual Assistants to handle as many of our contacts per year as possible.', 'You will contribute to the Customer Care strategy to shift channels from traditional methods of contact (voice calls, emails) to digital solutions (chat bot, voice bot), with the aim of having over a third of our contacts by the end of 2022 being handled by bots.', 'You main responsibility will be to analyse, prioritise, define, design and build conversation flows to support the development of our B2C Bot capability, working hand-in-hand with Product owners, Developers, Architects, Data analysts & Scientists, as well as Customer Care Agents.', 'Candidates should balance technical depth with customer empathy, strong execution capability, and a track record of delivering impactful business results.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Design innovative, user-focused conversational flows & interfaces for our various Voice & Chat bots including multi-modal user experiences', 'Design end-to-end conversational interactions, including what can go wrong, and how', 'Write multimodal conversations to adapt to each channel (Whatsapp, LiveChat, Facebook, Phone)', 'Drive solutions from design workshop to production, from conception to prototype to production-level experience', 'Plan and lead workshops, design reviews, and other types of meetings to align and communicate information to various parties as well as Senior Management', 'Develop mockups, flows and all other creative proto-typing related items']

['JOB DESCRIPTION:', 'This employee is responsible for providing support in the operation of the data communications networks by installing, trouble-shooting, and maintaining Cisco data communications equipment and supporting end users in the use of such equipment.', 'Duties of this position include but are not limited to:', 'Maintaining and installing network equipment including: Cisco routers, switches and other network devices', 'Trouble-shooting network equipment for data communications networks', 'Outstanding diagnostic, problem-solving and analytical skills', 'Providing support to end customers of data communications networks equipment.', 'Good communication skills', 'Performing other duties as assigned', 'REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Demonstrated knowledge of current products and services available and applicable to LAN/WAN, VMware and TCP/IP protocols and network technologies', 'Demonstrated knowledge of computing systems, electronics, and software development required to manage and trouble-shoot high performance client-server network applications', 'Hands-on experience with common software and hardware(Cisco)']

job description: ['We are looking for an enthusiastic and hands-on cyber security manager to lead and strengthen our IT security team to mitigate increasing cyber threats arising from digitization and innovation.', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Combine capabilities from security service providers and various in-house IT teams to strengthen 24/7 security operations capabilities, especially on incident response and remediation', 'Enforce good cyber hygiene and conduct cyber security awareness program', 'Conduct cyber security reviews and risk assessments on new technologies, IT systems and digitization solutions', 'Define and implement cyber security improvement projects to counter latest cyber threats', 'Develop and maintain cyber security policy, standards and guidelines', 'Oversee IT Disaster Recovery (DR) capability and conduct regular ITDR drills', 'Plan and manage cyber security budget and measure its effectiveness', 'Automate security operations and upkeep the technical capabilities of the team']

['[Ref: CES-M(ES)]', 'The Job', 'Assist the Senior Manager (Elderly Services) to establish the operational objectives, plans and policies for the estate-based social support programmes and elderly lounges in alignment with the corporate objectives.', 'Assist the Senior Manager (Elderly Services) to ensure the operation of the service teams and the elderly lounges are in full compliance with the project mission and corporate standard by reviewing and preparing the workflows, manuals, guidelines and service protocols.', 'Assist in managing the overall administration and staffing matters of the service teams in accordance with the policies and financial targets laid down by the Housing Society.', 'Smoothen the service delivery by utilizing, liaising, and negotiating with external parties;\xa0and make alliance with strategic partners to expedite our service development.', 'Efficiently and effectively manage designated projects, award presentation, working groups, ceremonies and events etc.', 'Support the overall preparation works and prepare presentation materials and draft papers for management’s approval on significant executions.', 'Handle emergency accidents, crisis, and/or complaints from the staffs, customers and external parties.', 'Undertake any other duties as assigned by the direct supervisor deems appropriate.', 'The Person', 'Degree holder or above, in Social Work and/or Health Science with minimum 8 years’ post qualification working experience in Government or related organizations, non-governmental organizations or public organizations.', 'Maintain administrative and supervisory experience with 3 years in Management level.', 'Previous in-charge-of community projects is preferable.', 'Good liaison with various service providers and stakeholders in different sectors, and others as relevant to the operation of the team.']

['About Standard Chartered', 'We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East.', "To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit.\xa0 It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.", "We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.", 'The Role Responsibilities', 'SRE Delivery team is delivering resilience solutions for Hong Kong. SRE Engineer is responsible for building resilience solutions strengthening the reliability, observability, operability and scalability across different business flows and applications of the bank.', "The System Reliability Engineer will ensure the overall system reliability, uptime, health, and performance of the bank's service.\xa0 The candidate will work closely with various stakeholders to understand the architecture and design of different applications in the bank in order to help quickly resolve service impacting issues, detect and self-heal problems before they become service impacting, and provide valuable information and data back to the application developers in order to improve the long-term reliability of the platform. The candidate would have a strong knowledge of SRE and Agile delivery practices, as well as a disciplined approach to planning, executing and reporting.", 'The role will require ongoing engagement with Application Development/Support, Product, and Operations teams to manage SRE efforts and create clients first mindset and effectively implement client journeys-based Service Level Deliveries with the support of SRE Delivery Head.', 'Effectively manage multiple stakeholder demands and expectations while maintaining quality and delivery']

['Hang Seng Indexes Company Ltd', 'Hang Seng Indexes Company Limited (‘Hang Seng Indexes Company’) manages and compiles the Hang Seng Family of Indexes, which cover stocks listed in Hong Kong and Mainland China. Our index series includes the Hang Seng Index, the Hang Seng China Enterprises Index and the Hang Seng TECH Index, as well as Stock Connect, Greater Bay Area and sector-related indexes. As at the end of 2020, assets under management in products passively tracking indexes in the Hang Seng Family of Indexes had reached a total of about US$38 billion.', 'Hang Seng Indexes Company is a wholly owned subsidiary of Hang Seng Bank. Our company is a team of professionals who strives for delivering quality, efficient and world-class index complier services to customers and financial institutions around the world.', 'We are currently seeking a high caliber professional to join our department as', 'Assistant\xa0IT Development', 'Manager.', 'Principal responsibilities', 'Manage system development projects in the above business areas aligning with the Bank’s project management framework;']

['Job Scope:', "Manage and lead the Group Innovation and Technology team in managing all IT systems, policies and processes, cyber-security risks and IT project management of the Group, while bringing in new innovations and technologies to support group's Innovation and Technology development strategies to cope with the volatile environment and continuous crave for latest technologies from all our guests and stakeholders.", 'Analyze business requirements and assess the IT needs to develop IT strategy, network infrastructure and processes to improve hotel operational efficiency and services. Manage and maintain the smooth operation on the hotel computer system within Wharf Hotels in Hong Kong, China and ASEAN countries.', 'Conduct product and vendor evaluations so as to provide technical recommendations on purchase of new computer systems and other electronic equipment to ensure all user requirements are met at the least possible cost.', 'Prepare and monitor the departmental budget, control the expenses with a focus on IT strategy, building initiatives and hardware & software inventory management. Provide technical support and IT solutions when needed. Stay on top of the latest technology development that can be applied in hospitality. Ensure the compliance with standards supporting integration of and convergence to new solutions as they emerge.', 'Primary Responsibility:', 'To formulate Innovation and Technology strategies for the Hotels Group', 'To make use of big data and facilitate User Experience', 'To formulate and construct the IT Infrastructure and IT Policies', 'To achieve the KPIs to cope with the development direction of the Hotel Group', 'To manage teammates and various Internal/External stakeholders so as to achieve the project management and Project implementation targets', 'Your Skills:', 'Bachelor Degree in Business Administration/Computer Science or equivalent', 'Over 20 years of experience in related field, of which 16 years are in management position', 'Good business sense and excellent knowledge in hotel operation and automation, especially in hotel PMS, Back Office, Telephone Interface, POS, Office Automation, Corporate-wide Communications infrastructure, etc.', 'Strong inter-personal skills', 'Willing to travel if necessary']

job title: Manager (Procurement) (at the rank of Finance Manager)
job description: ['Manager (Procurement)', '(at the rank of Finance Manager) in the Finance and Enterprises Office', '(Ref.: 508793) (to commence as soon as possible, on a two-year fixed-term basis with contract-end gratuity and University contribution to a retirement benefits scheme, totalling up to 10% of basic salary, with the possibility of renewal)', 'The University of Hong Kong has been undergoing a transformational programme to enhance its operational/administrative efficiency and move towards customer orientation whilst maintaining corporate governance.\xa0 The Finance and Enterprises Office of the University is looking for a seasoned procurement professional who will play a catalyst role in the Procurement Unit to undergo transformational change in procurement for the University and its subsidiaries with an annual purchase value of HK$2 billion.\xa0 The appointee will lead the teams to undergo a major change towards Centre-led procurement operating model.', 'Applicants should possess:', 'a good Bachelor’s degree in Procurement, Supply Chain, Business, Engineering or related field, preferably with a professional qualification in procurement (e.g. CIPS, CPSM, CPSD);', 'a minimum of 10 years’ post-qualification and relevant procurement experience of which at least 5 years at managerial or supervisory level;', 'all-round procurement category experience (proved in local or regional context) with “Strategic Category Management” experience of either corporate goods/services (including Travel) professional services (e.g. Legal/Audit/HR) IT hardware and services scientific/engineering equipment or facility management services', 'solid experience in category management organisation and/or public sector procurement operation;', 'the ability to define and implement strategies within the agreed timeline;', 'good project management skills with strong problem solving and business acumen;', 'very good understanding of governance and compliance in procurement, preferably in the public sector or sizeable organisations;', 'strong communication and presentation skills; excellent people and leadership skills with the ability to inspire, influence, build trust and respect among stakeholders and communicate with technical and non-technical personnel at multiple organisation levels of the University;', 'good knowledge of business law and understanding of regulatory requirements;', 'experience in leading a small operational team being a definite advantage;', 'knowledge of Procurement ERP with eProcurement/eTendering systems being a plus;', 'an excellent command of both written and spoken English and Chinese, with knowledge of Putonghua being an advantage; and', 'proficiency in MS Office (including excellent data analysis) and Chinese word processing.']

['Research Assistant I/II in the Department of Social Work and Social Administration', '(Ref.: 508656) (to commence as soon as possible for one year, with the possibility of renewal subject to satisfactory performance and funding availability)', 'Applicants should possess a Bachelor’s degree in Social Work, Psychology, Social Sciences or other related disciplines, with one to two years of post-qualification experience. \xa0They should have proficiency in written and spoken English and Chinese (including Cantonese); skills in analytical evaluation and generation of practical solutions; and the ability to work independently and as a team player. \xa0Those with post-qualification work experience in social sciences research projects and knowledge in data analysis are preferred.', 'The appointee will assist the Principal Investigator in implementing a research project on social entrepreneurship and people with disabilities; be responsible for data collection and analysis, preparing presentations, and drafting reports; and perform any other duties as assigned. \xa0They will have ample opportunities to work with research professionals, social workers as well as stakeholders in the local community.', 'A highly competitive salary commensurate with qualifications and experience will be offered, in addition to annual leave and medical benefits.', 'The University only accepts online applications for the above post. \xa0Applicants should apply online and upload an up-to-date CV, a covering letter stating their research background and the contact information of two referees. \xa0Inquiries should be sent to Dr. Cheryl Chui.\xa0 Review of applications will start as soon as possible and continue until', 'November 30, 2021', ', or until the post is filled, whichever is earlier.']

job title: (Senior) Java Analyst Programmer/ Developer - high pay
job description: ['Sabetech delivers integrated leading IT service in multi-cloud application services, aggregated data services, applications development, and Fin-Tech products for fast-growing emerging overseas countries.', 'Our distributed teams are developing a cloud-native marketplace solution scaled across 3 countries for 100k+ daily users. And it will serve more countries and users in the near future.', 'What you will do:', 'Find, analyse and solve existing and challenging production technology problems in the distributed system serving more than 100+ million requests per day;', 'Responsible for researching, maintaining, extending and improving the backbone of the most state-of-the-art OLTP service platform;', 'Design and implement microservices to be deployed on docker clusters managed by Kubernetes and work with a lot of cloud applications upon Amazon AWS cloud;', 'Have chance to develop useful technology plugins and components based on the mature framework and contribute to the community; and', 'Organize technology share periodically to improve the whole technology ability of the team.', 'Whom we are looking for:', '3+ years experience as a Java engineer, with a degree holder or above in Computer Science, Information Technology or related disciplines;', 'Strong sense of responsibility to ensure the online business running smoothly and are proud of delivering the most reliable transaction service to customers;', 'Self-driven and eager to explore and apply the latest backend technology;', 'Strong knowledge of Java backend development and are familiar with Java Programming (JDK, Multi-Thread Programming, JUC);', 'Aware of performance and scalability aspects of Java (Java Multi-Thread improvement, Java GC). And the experience of identifying Java Performance problems would be an extra bonus;', 'Used to working on Spring boot, and the experience on Spring Cloud will be a plus;', 'Experience of transactional business programming based on MySQL;']

['Main Responsibilities', "To support talent development in the banking industry, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) has initiated a Banking Talent Programme ('the Programme') and CCB (Asia) is one of the participating banks. Under the Programme, the bank will offer short-term work opportunities to fresh graduates in 2021. The Programme period will last till February 28, 2022, during which centralised training, internal training and professional training will be provided to the successful candidates. For more details, please refer to the HKIB program web page (www.hkib.org/bankingtalent).", 'Candidates will be allocated to one of the divisions in CCBA and a mentor will be assigned for each employee. ['Everyone at OliveX stands behind these core values:', 'Fun – when you are winning, you have more fun. Not just beer pong and chilled atmosphere. Also, super PLUS if the person is into fitness', 'Fab – feeling fabulous means being confident without being arrogant, being fab means you are unafraid of other people misunderstanding you. job title: Assistant Director - Product Consultant, Hong Kong
job description: ['Job Description', 'Product Consultants are expert in the implementation, configuration and upgrade of Basel II/Basel III, liquidity risk and ALM software solutions. In this position, you will:', '• Assist clients with all stages of a product implementation:', '• Proof of concept', '• Gap analysis and data mapping', '• Product installation and configuration', '• Development of custom functionality', '• Testing', '• User and technical training', '• Have strong knowledge of the business domain that our product operates in and how to use our product to fulfill customer needs.', '• Work with project managers to build and maintain a project plan and issues list.', '• Work with product managers to give feedback on the product and to log product defects.', '• Stay current on the functionality of our products.', '• Share knowledge with other consultants on how best to implement our products', '• This role requires a significant amount of travel to client sites.', 'Qualifications', '• Degree in finance, financial engineering, economics or information technology.', 'Professional accreditation (such as FRM, CFA, etc.) will be an added advantage.', '• Master Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics or Finance, will be an advantage.', "• At least 3-5 years' experience of working in a Software implementation role", '• Significant experience in the Banking Industry within risk management', '• Basel II and Basel III or ALM exposure gained in a Bank, a consultancy firm or a Software engineering company', 'Excellent knowledge of existing and international regulatory requirements (e.g. EU - Capital Requirements Directive - CRD, Basel II) and in depth understanding of the proposed revision of the international regulatory framework (Basel III, CRD 3, CRD 4)', 'Relevant professional qualifications (e.g.FRM or CFA) is a plus', '• Technical skills on Relational databases and SQL', '• Experience in Data Mapping between systems of financial and risk data', '• Knowledge of Data Modelling within the Banking sector']

['Project\xa0Description', 'We are looking for Experienced Test Engineer (Manual and Automation) in HK to join to software and service delivery team within Technology center of Global Investment bank.', 'Responsibilities', '- Design and build the automated test frameworks and test suites for use in development and testing cycles', "- Utilize innovative test technologies to develop a product's testing strategy", '- Participating in design and code inspections.', '- Perform manual testing, the scope of which will encompass all functionality of services to as a prequel to Automation', 'Skills', 'Must have', '- University degree in computer science, information systems or related field of study', '- Prior working experience in a large scale financial institution', '- 5 Years of working experience in automation tools like Cypress, Selenium and TestComplete', '- Strong Python skills for test automation.', '- Have Developed automation frameworks Hybrid framework, Keyword and Data driven.', '- Working experience with APIs testing using tools like Soap UI, Postman, Swagger or Karate framework.', '- Experience in database test automation that includes connection to various database testing - Oracle & SQL server', '- Experience in test strategies, methodologies such as BDD/TDD and Agile', '- Knowledge of other type of testing - e.g. integration, regression, unit, system and user acceptance testing', '- Strong ability to debug code, analyze failures and trace defects to root cause', '- Strong interpersonal communication skills and a successful team player.', '- Extensive experience in Developing, Executing and Maintaining Automation Test Plan, Test Strategy, Test Scenarios and Test Cases and Reporting system.']

['The Role', 'SEEK is undertaking numerous significant transformation initiatives as part of its continued journey of growth and evolution, one of them is the CRM Transformation as a part of our Unification Program. The CRM project is focused on standardising the operating processes cross countries, to replace and enhance SEEK Asia’s current Customer Relationship Management system. A key objective of the CRM project is to have all client data integrated and available through one central platform, so SEEK can become more efficient in how it manages multi-functional relationships with its customers, and more sophisticated and targeted in how it engages and delivers insights. This is a large-scale transformation, which has change implications across the entire business.', 'Given the scale and complexity of change involved, the project has identified the need for an experienced Change Manager who will be dedicated to the project for the next 24 months. This person will be responsible for advising on effective change management practices and providing the hands-on change planning, engagement and training delivery that’s needed to successfully deliver the project and align to the SEEK Unification direction. This person will also be expected to lead a change team and work with local change advocates to roll out CRM changes impacting different countries across Asia.', 'Key responsibilities:', 'Deliver the operational change management strategy and plan for the CRM Transformation program in line with the approach and frameworks that have been agreed. Align approach to change management across Asia Pacific (APAC) Unification workstreams to create a culture of innovation and adoption across all geographies.', 'Be the focal point for the project team in providing advice and leading the execution of change management activities, with a people first mindset', 'Conduct detailed change impact assessment and risk mitigation strategies; understand and mitigate cross functional dependencies. Escalate if there is an issue.', 'Design change plans to ensure engagement of the SEEK Asia workforce and adoption of new platforms and practices. Manage and maintain overall change plan, report progress and feedback about concerns and feedback to both CRM Asia project team and APAC Unification Change Council.', 'Develop program-level and tactical-level training programs and communications ready for distribution, partnering with relevant project team members to prepare the required content. Partnering with relevant project team members, lead training needs analysis and definition of the detailed training strategy/approach. Conduct trainings if required.', 'Support project team members with their own specific communications, providing advice/review to ensure clarity and consistency of messaging aligned with the change program.']

job title: Senior Engineer / Engineer – Polymer Composites and Encapsulation Technologies
company name: The Nano and Advanced Materials Institute Limited (NAMI)
job description: ['Duties', 'The appointee will work on the development of polymer composites and Nano-/micro-encapsulation technique. His/her role will involve formulation study of polymerization of Nano-/micro-capsules and assembly the capsules into matrix composites with desired performance requirements such as mechanical performance, temperature, thermal conductivity, service life; as well as the processing into finished products. ['POSITION DESCRIPTION', 'TITLE', ':\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0MARKETING OFFICER', 'RESPONSIBLE TO:\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 HEAD OF MARKETING', 'RESPONSIBLE FOR:\xa0 \xa0HANDLING MARKETING AND DIGITAL INITIATIVES', 'ORGANISATIONAL MISSION', ':', 'The HKMM is an independent, not-for-profit responsible for the collection, documentation and presentation of maritime material culture associated with Hong Kong, the South China Sea and the Pearl River Delta.', 'Working with the Hong Kong Government, members of the Hong Kong Shipowners Association, academic institutions, cultural and community partners, the HKMM is developing an international standard maritime museum and research centre at Pier 8.', 'Our mission is to chronicle, analyse and communicate knowledge about the oceans and their dynamic relationship with the past, present and future of Hong Kong, the mainland of China and the world.\xa0 We particularly explore shipping, maritime trade, naval activity, maritime-related leisure, arts and culture, and the sustainability of the oceans. Through a unique fusion of history, art and science, the HKMM creates crossover learning experiences for local, regional and international audiences. Integral to our mission is to be credible, accessible and inclusive when connecting with our stakeholders communities.', 'POSITION OBJECTIVE', "The function of the Marketing Officer is to work closely with the Head of Marketing in formulating and implementing the Museum's marketing and digital strategies, with the targets of driving visitation, building brand awareness and growing digital presence.", 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES']

['THE ROLE', 'As a Cloud Solution Architect, you have the technical knowledge to build architectural designs, review technical architecture designs and also commercial skills, to optimally present cloud solutions to customers. You have a specific focus on Public Cloud (AWS, Azure or GCP) as well as DevOps, DevSecOps and cloud native app services.', 'You will also work alongside Project Managers, Scrum Masters, DevOps engineers and Enterprise Architects in customer engagements and to build the high-level design to deliver customer multi-cloud and containerized solutions. You will also be required to support the deployment and delivery with hands-on experience as required during the pre or post design architectural cycle.', 'THE REQUIREMENTS', 'You need to possess experience in Public Cloud solution design, you are technically experienced, but also strong in customer communications and able to build a positive customer relationship. Furthermore, our ideal Cloud Architect can lead a critical discussion on cloud technologies, for Atos, as well as customers.', 'Above all, you are a hardworking person that takes ownership of his/her work and show perseverance to reach the desired result.', 'YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Support ATOS as required with client conversations demonstrating your Public Cloud technical expertise to help customers in their journey to and optimization on cloud.', 'Translate customer requirements into a high-level design for customer acceptance and internal delivery sign-off.']

job title: Technical Officer (BMS) in the Campus Development Office [Ref. A/551/03]
job description: ['Duties', 'Assist in overseeing the day-to-day operation and maintenance of Building Management System (BMS) installed in campus buildings, staff quarters, student hostels and off-campus areas. \xa0The appointee is responsible for:', 'Providing technical support for fault finding, troubleshooting, system diagnosis, data acquisition measurement and monitoring the performance of E&M systems;', 'Supervising contractors to rectify/improve the BMS including software programming, re-design of control logic, repair and calibration of field devices, control loop tuning and optimization, system interface with other systems, point-to-point test, end-to-end test and integrated system functional test;', 'Implementing Wi-Fi sensors and data loggers installation including programming of application software;', 'Monitoring and responding appropriately to alarms, interpreting collected data and proposing solutions;', 'Documenting changes/modifications to BMS and enhancing BMS interface and graphics;', 'Performing energy management and suggesting/implementing energy saving initiatives;', 'Assisting in the safety and technical training; and', 'Attending emergency calls and performing any other assignments.', 'The appointee is required to work night shift.', 'Requirements', 'A Bachelor’s degree/Diploma/Certificate/Apprenticeship in Building Services/Mechanical/Electrical Engineering or related disciplines;', 'At least 3 years’ hands-on experience in design, installation operation and maintenance of BMS, HVAC automation controls, energy management systems or related experience, with a valid safety training course certificate (commonly known as “Green Card”);', 'Proficiency in MS Office applications (including Word and Excel);', 'Good command of written and spoken English and Chinese;', 'Strong sense of risk awareness and responsibility; commitment to teamwork; good interpersonal skills; being self-motivated; capability to supervise in-house and out-sourced works; and ability to work independently under pressure against tight schedules are required.']

['Job Function', 'Under general supervision, independently manages execution and timely completion of basic engineering projects by analyzing project scope and determining project specifications, establishing test programs for product investigations, analyzing test programs for adequacy and sequence, examining samples for compliance and preparing reports for clients. Assists in the development of test methods, and test equipment. Exercises Project Handler Signature Authority as Project Handler of record responsible for opening, maintenance, completion, and closing of assigned new work engineering projects. May exercise Review Signature Authority as assigned as Reviewer of record responsible for initial review, status review, and final technical review of all new work engineering projects.', 'Job Responsibilities', 'Determines project scope, develops a preliminary plan of investigation, and determines project specifications such as cost, time, and sample requirements by analyzing client input, available supplemental data, and product construction. Projects may include travel to conduct or witness tests at client sites.', 'Initiates communication with clients to promote and explain the benefits of new and existing services. Follows up on contacts from clients. Communicates with clients to discuss technical issues, explain UL procedures and requirements, convey project cost, and negotiate completion date and sample requirements. Acts to address client concerns and to resolve client issues. Provides technical assistance to clients in reference to product inspection and follow-up services.', "Establishes appropriate test programs by reviewing files and manufacturer's information, examining samples, and applying UL requirements. Is familiar with applicable standards, company manuals and appropriate technical literature. Examines samples for compliance with UL requirements and notifies client of any areas in which the product is not in compliance or of any changes in project scope or specifications.", 'Coordinates laboratory activities by preparing data sheets and instructions to technicians, scheduling and reviewing work of laboratory technicians and engineering support staff, and establishing completion dates. Coordinates administrative aspects of project management. Serves as Project Handler of record and may sign as Reviewer of record as assigned.', 'Communicates project status and results to clients through frequent contact and by preparing reports. Prepares Follow-Up Service Procedures and information pages.', 'Integrates continuous improvement concepts and techniques into all aspects of the job.', 'Resolves engineering issues associated with Variation Notices by analyzing and reporting on the acceptability of the variations.', 'Assists in the development of UL requirements. Assists in developing special test methods and test equipment. Analyzes test program for adequacy and sequence. May coordinate and/or perform File Reviews, as directed. May represent UL at industry related functions such as seminars and trade shows.', 'Performs other duties as directed.', 'Job Requirements', 'Degree in Product Testing/ Electronic Engineering/ Electrical Engineering/ Mechanical Engineering/Engineering Technology /Science or above with 2-4 years’ relevant experience;', 'Experience in Small Appliances product safety standards, IEC60335 series testing and laboratory experience is required;', 'Good command of spoken and written English and Mandarin is essential;', 'Strong sense of customer focus, good interpersonal and communication skills;']

and', '(e) Preference will be given to candidates who have working experience in the government bureaux/departments or local education sector.', '[Remarks : This post is open to male and female applicants.]', 'Duties:', '(a) To review Information Technology (IT) systems and make plans for enhancements considering the genuine business needs;', '(b) To coordinate the delivery of projects, from collecting user requirements on system design, liaison with the technical team on system specifications to testing of IT systems;', '(c) To prepare, review and update system user manuals and to handle technical and operational enquiries from users;', '(d) To develop, maintain and update webpages;', '(e) To organise professional development programmes for management and teachers of the kindergarten sector;', '(f) To compile reports, statistics and related documents;', '(g) To supervise the performance of junior staff as appropriate; and', '(h) To perform other duties as assigned by supervisors.', 'Terms of Appointment: Successful candidates will be employed on non-civil service contract terms for 1 year.', 'Fringe Benefits', '(a) 14 days annual leave and full pay sickness allowance whereas rest days, statutory holidays(or substituted holidays), maternity leave/paternity leave, where appropriate, will be granted in accordance with the provisions of the Employment Ordinance.', '(b) A gratuity may be granted upon satisfactory completion of the contract with consistently high standard of performance and conduct. Such gratuity, if granted, plus any contribution made by the Government to a Mandatory Provident Fund (MPF) scheme in respect of the appointee as required by the MPF Schemes Ordinance, will be equal to 10% of the total basic salary drawn during the contract period.']

['At Vyond, our mission is to put the power of video in the hands of everyone. Vyond allows people of all skill levels in all industries and job roles to create dynamic and powerful media. With features that go beyond moving text and images, you can build character-driven stories or compelling data visualizations that engage audiences and deliver results.', 'Founded as GoAnimate in 2007, Vyond has helped Global 2000 organizations, small businesses, and individuals produce more than 30 million videos.', 'With offices in Silicon Valley, Hong Kong, and Taiwan, Vyond employs a team of people whose creativity extends well beyond our office walls. We are passionate about the power of video and how it makes the static dynamic and transforms the mundane into the captivating.', 'VYOND™ is a trademark of GoAnimate, Inc.', 'Description', 'Senior Engineer (Growth) assists the Product Team by creating tools, technology, interfaces and data pipelines to help our product reach even more users. This is an exciting role that will let you change the product in subtle, but powerful ways. If you like experimenting with product features and finding answers in the data then this job is for you!', 'Responsibilities', 'Monitor KPIs such as engagement, churn and growth, down to the feature level.', 'Work with different internal teams to find potential areas for customer growth.', 'Analyse data, find important patterns and suggest ways to improve the product across all touch points.', 'Collaborate with Engineering, Finance, Billing, Product and Data teams to prepare functional & technical documentation.', 'Design, code and run A/B tests, then report actual performance against predicted values.', 'Requirements', 'Degree in Computer Science or related field.', 'Technical proficiency on Node.js and ReactJS.', 'Experience with UX patterns and UI coding.', 'Familiar with RESTful API design and implementation.', 'Familiar with database design and operation.', 'Experience in subscription management systems is an advantage.']

['[Ref: CES-SO(ES)]', 'The Job:', 'Assist in manage the overall operation and administration of the estate-based social support services and Elderly Lounges.', 'Assist in service delivery including to enhance the social capital, to deliver counseling and case management, to provide social activities and volunteer services, to provide support to the property management staff, and to visit all tenants in elderly flats and assisted-living flats.', 'Assist in coordinating with the Estate Management Offices and Occupational therapists for on-going facility improvement and home modification at respective rental estates.', 'Assist in liaising and coordinating with collaborators from planning to implementation of activities, programs and groups to promote home safety, health and social care to meet with various needs of elderly tenants.', 'Assist in monitoring site management such as cleaning and maintenance, inventory and procurement, report and statistic, program planning and evaluation.', 'Handle daily requests, enquiries and complaints of the elderly tenants and on site coordination between internal and external parties; in case of any emergency, determine prompt action with the contingency plan to ensure safety for the elderly tenants.', 'Provide guidance and arrange duties for S4 / O4 to ensure the service quality and standard of estate-based social support services.', 'Undertake any other duties as assigned by the direct supervisor deems appropriate.', 'The Person:', 'Diploma holder or above in social work / health science with minimum 3-5 years’ post qualification working experience in recognized welfare organization of elderly service; community services is preferable.', 'Good manner, self-motivated and able to work independently.', 'Sensitive to interpersonal relations with good communication skill.', 'Good command of both written and spoken English and Chinese.']

['[Ref: CES-M(ES)]', 'The Job', 'Assist the Senior Manager (Elderly Services) to establish the operational objectives, plans and policies for the estate-based social support programmes and elderly lounges in alignment with the corporate objectives.', 'Assist the Senior Manager (Elderly Services) to ensure the operation of the service teams and the elderly lounges are in full compliance with the project mission and corporate standard by reviewing and preparing the workflows, manuals, guidelines and service protocols.', 'Assist in managing the overall administration and staffing matters of the service teams in accordance with the policies and financial targets laid down by the Housing Society.', 'Smoothen the service delivery by utilizing, liaising, and negotiating with external parties;\xa0and make alliance with strategic partners to expedite our service development.', 'Efficiently and effectively manage designated projects, award presentation, working groups, ceremonies and events etc.', 'Support the overall preparation works and prepare presentation materials and draft papers for management’s approval on significant executions.', 'Handle emergency accidents, crisis, and/or complaints from the staffs, customers and external parties.', 'Undertake any other duties as assigned by the direct supervisor deems appropriate.', 'The Person', 'Degree holder or above, in Social Work and/or Health Science with minimum 8 years’ post qualification working experience in Government or related organizations, non-governmental organizations or public organizations.', 'Maintain administrative and supervisory experience with 3 years in Management level.', 'Previous in-charge-of community projects is preferable.', 'Good liaison with various service providers and stakeholders in different sectors, and others as relevant to the operation of the team.']

['Hang Seng Indexes Company Ltd', 'Hang Seng Indexes Company Limited (‘Hang Seng Indexes Company’) manages and compiles the Hang Seng Family of Indexes, which cover stocks listed in Hong Kong and Mainland China. Our index series includes the Hang Seng Index, the Hang Seng China Enterprises Index and the Hang Seng TECH Index, as well as Stock Connect, Greater Bay Area and sector-related indexes. As at the end of 2020, assets under management in products passively tracking indexes in the Hang Seng Family of Indexes had reached a total of about US$38 billion.', 'Hang Seng Indexes Company is a wholly owned subsidiary of Hang Seng Bank. Our company is a team of professionals who strives for delivering quality, efficient and world-class index complier services to customers and financial institutions around the world.', 'We are currently seeking a high caliber professional to join our department as', 'Assistant\xa0IT Development', 'Manager.', 'Principal responsibilities', 'Manage system development projects in the above business areas aligning with the Bank’s project management framework;']

job description: ['The China Daily Hong Kong Edition is recognized by both the newspaper industry and readers for its exceptional journalism and outstanding reporting. Follow up with print houses and agents on final delivery of our printed and online publications.', 'Perform daily support and maintenance to the application systems;', 'Provide and PC installation, configuration and administration', 'Administer IT asset inventories, ensuring records are kept up to date']

['Who We are Looking for', 'Silverhorn is an owner-managed multi-asset investment firm delivering investment solutions that bridge geographies and markets to offer exceptional access to unique opportunities in Europe, Asia, and beyond. Silverhorn is making the effort to transform itself into a data-driven organization with the help of in-house and externally developed solutions. The Silverhorn Technology Team is looking into hiring a talented Front-End Web designer/developer, who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application.', 'The team is developing a new all-around client management platform that connects it to the portfolio management system. The candidate will be responsible for application integration and product development.\xa0We aim to use the latest technologies to implement solutions for our clients, employees, and management members to provide best-in-class software tools and resources to perform their tasks independently and efficiently.', 'We are looking for people who are passionate about solving business problems through innovation and engineering practices. We encourage diversity of thought and creative solutions to constantly strive for improvement. The candidate will be working in a collaborative, trusting, growing business environment.', 'Why Work with Silverhorn Group', 'Founded in 2010, Silverhorn is an owner-managed investment partner delivering multi-asset solutions that utilize on-the-ground access and Asia expertise.\xa0Our multicultural team of 50 spans Hong Kong, Switzerland and Singapore to bridge European investors with Asian investment solutions.', 'We are owner-managed and proud to have a friendly work culture where everyone helps build a climate of excellence, mutual trust and respect;', 'We hold ourselves to the highest standards because the details matter;', 'We are never satisfied because we love what we do. C/710/03]', 'Duties', 'Provide administrative support on admissions, student records and marketing of postgraduate programmes, including day-to-day administration of student records and related work processes, coordination of system development and enhancement projects, committee servicing, coordination of projects/events initiated by the School; provide executive support to senior staff members; and perform any other duties as assigned.', 'Occasional travels to Mainland China and other countries may be required.', 'Requirements', 'A Bachelor’s degree with at least 2 years’ post-qualification working experience.\xa0 Good command of written and spoken English and Chinese (including Putonghua); proficiency in IT skills (including data and webpage management) and hands-on knowledge of computer systems application; solid customer service experience with the ability to handle complicated student cases; good interpersonal, organizational and problem solving skills; ability to work independently and effectively under pressure; and a strong sense of responsibility are required.', 'Shortlisted candidates will be invited for a written test.', 'Salary and Conditions of Service', 'Remuneration package will be highly competitive, commensurate with qualifications and experience.\xa0 Appointment will be made on a fixed-term contract; fringe benefits include gratuity, leave, medical and dental schemes.', 'Information and Application', 'Further information on the post and the University is available at', 'http://www.cityu.edu.hk', ', or from the Human Resources Office, City University of Hong Kong, Tat Chee Avenue, Kowloon Tong, Hong Kong [Fax : 2788 1154 or 3442 0311].', 'To apply, please submit an online application at', 'http://jobs.cityu.edu.hk', '. The closing date is', '12 November\xa02021', '.', 'Applications will receive full consideration and only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.\xa0 The University’s privacy policy is available on the homepage.', 'City University of Hong Kong is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to the principle of diversity. Personal data provided by applicants will be used for recruitment and other employment-related purposes.']

responsibility: ['Work with operating companies to implement D&I programmes/initiatives by ensuring key D&I performance indicators, goals, measurement, timeline and accountability are set.', 'Review recruitment and talent development practice to ensure we capitalize on a diverse talent pool and use D&I data to drive and inform inclusive recruitment, retention, development and promotion processes.', 'Work with learning & development team(s) to promote and develop programmes to build awareness and enhance understanding of D&I issues for our staff.', 'Provide coaching support on D&I issues for operating companies.', 'Conduct research and benchmarking on best practice and trends especially on D&I focus area(s).', 'Maintain and develop networks with diversity and inclusion related organizations and agencies to stay current with trends and regulations that may impact the Group’s business.', 'Work with Group Head to prepare annual plan and budget to deliver on agreed D&I goals.', 'Requirements:', 'Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business, Social Science or related field; preferably with metrics and analytics background.', 'Passionate diversity, equity & inclusion advocate.']
job description: ['John Swire & Sons (H.K.) Limited is the holding company of the publicly-listed conglomerate, Swire Pacific Ltd. Our Diversity & Inclusion team invites applications for the following position:', 'Group Diversity & Inclusion Manager', 'The Group Diversity & Inclusion Manager will support the Group Head of Diversity & Inclusion in creating an inclusive and supportive working environment for all our people by working with Swire group operating companies’ HRBPs and D&I committees to deliver on our D&I strategic framework. The Group Manager will work with the Analytics and Insights team to ensure the people and D&I data will provide insights and inform decisions to ensure we meet our D&I targets. S/he will take up an account service role for specific operating companies and act as subject-matter expert in one or more of the D&I focus areas.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Work with operating companies to implement D&I programmes/initiatives by ensuring key D&I performance indicators, goals, measurement, timeline and accountability are set.', 'Review recruitment and talent development practice to ensure we capitalize on a diverse talent pool and use D&I data to drive and inform inclusive recruitment, retention, development and promotion processes.', 'Work with learning & development team(s) to promote and develop programmes to build awareness and enhance understanding of D&I issues for our staff.', 'Provide coaching support on D&I issues for operating companies.', 'Conduct research and benchmarking on best practice and trends especially on D&I focus area(s).', 'Maintain and develop networks with diversity and inclusion related organizations and agencies to stay current with trends and regulations that may impact the Group’s business.']

job title: 研究員 Researchers experienced in public policies
job description: ['天大研究院是一家設立於香港的公益性戰略研究智庫，聚焦經濟、政策、社會及國際關係等研究領域。現誠邀熱心研究工作且有相關經驗的人士，加入天大研究院擔任全職或兼職研究員，就一些共同感興趣的戰略性問題進行研究、討論和思考。', '研究員主要是負責研究工作，申請人必須持有相關領域之博士或以上學位，並在學術研究或公共機構擁有至少3年以上宏觀戰略研究經驗。申請人須具備優秀中英文口語及書面表達能力，能獨立制定研究計畫和撰寫報告，並能以流利的普通話和廣東話進行會議和討論。通過篩選之申請人需要進行筆試。', '天大研究院提供', '5', '天工作周及優厚薪酬福利。有意申請者按"Apply Now" 提交個人履歷、目前及期望薪金', '。如欲了解更多詳情，歡迎參閱天大研究院官方網頁', 'https://www.tiandainstitute.org', '。通過初步篩選之申請人將在', '4', '周內收到通知。', 'Tianda Institute is looking for researchers experienced in public policies.', 'Tianda Institute is a non-profit think tank undertaking strategic studies on a wide range of economic, political, social and international relations issues. The Institute has recently set up the Hong Kong Policy Research Centre to undertake research studies which will have impact on the strategic and sustainable development of Hong Kong. The Institute invites experienced researchers who have a passion for Hong Kong’s development and, on a much wider scale, its significance in China’s strategic development to work as full-time or part-time researchers primarily undertaking projects relating to Hong Kong public policy research. The studies undertaken by the researchers are evidence-based with strong emphasis on statistical analysis and public/stakeholders engagement.', 'Applicants must have attained qualifications at PhD or equivalent in social sciences or other relevant fields, with at least 3 years of experience in public policy and strategy research in academic or research institutes or public organizations.', 'Applicants must have excellent command of English and Chinese, both spoken and written, and must be able to develop research plans and write reports independently. Applicants must also have excellent interpersonal skills and be able to conduct focus-group meetings and survey interviews in fluent Cantonese and Putonghua. Applicants will be required to undertake written tests after being shortlisted.', 'Tianda Institute operates on 5-day work-week and offers competitive remuneration package to successful candidates. Interested parties are requested to click "Apply Now" and submit\xa0 their resume with current and expected salaries. Applicants who do not receive any invitation for interview within 4 weeks may consider their applications not successful. Information about Tianda Institute is available at', 'https://www.tiandainstitute.org', 'to know more about us.', 'All personal data collected will be treated in strict confidence and will only be used for recruitment purpose.']

Interest in platform governance would be a plus. Experience in web data scraping, data mining, or selenium is preferred.", 'Duties include (a) assisting in research design and data collection; and (b) preparing reports related to the project.', 'Appointment will initially be made on contract basis for one year commencing January 2022, renewable subject to mutual agreement.', 'Job', ':', 'Research Posts', 'Organization', ':', 'School of Journalism and Communication']

['WeLab is a leading fintech company in Asia, \xa0which operates one of first licensed digital banks in Asia – WeLab Bank, as well as multiple leading online financial services businesses including WeLend and WeLab Bank in Hong Kong, WeLab Digital (我来数科), Taoxinji (淘新机), Wallet Gugu (钱夹谷谷) and Tianmian Tech (天冕科技)\xa0in Mainland China and Maucash in Indonesia. WeLab aims to bring joy to everyone’s financial journey. We strive to improve people’s lives by reinventing financial services through game-changing technology. We put our people first, whether it’s our customers or our employees.', 'As the only homegrown Hong Kong fintech to receive a virtual banking license, we aim to reinvent and redefine the banking experience by building a bank we love.', 'We are an energetic and passionate team that can deliver and execute. We are looking for other intellectually curious, open-minded and smart-working individuals who are just as passionate as we are about making financial services enjoyable. Now you have the opportunity to join us on our journey to achieve our vision and be part of building a better financial future for everyone.', 'About you:', "You're a go-getter with mad juggling skills (or multiple hats) who can thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment", "You have a strong thirst for knowledge and are driven to find solutions that don't exist yet", "You are comfortable with ambiguity and extremely resourceful (in your past life you could've been a detective)", 'You always find a way to get things done without sacrificing the quality of your work, integrity and values. No task is off limits for you.', 'You are humble and prioritize the success of the team over your own with an eagerness to help those around you', "You don't shy away from challenges and have the ability to bounce back from setbacks"]
