job description: ['Our company is a leading electronic service provider in providing security, IOT & AI solutions in Hong Kong, and Macau. Our company was established in 2001, and have expanded and developed into an industry leader today owing to our exclusive low voltage (ELV) and IT technologies. Due to rapid expansion, we are looking for a high caliber candidate to join our Major Client Project Team.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Report to Senior Project Manager in implementing the project by monitoring the work schedule', 'Prepare and file materials submission and project documentation', 'Participate project meeting and join site walk', 'Coordinate with subcontractors, clients, and internal project teams', 'Perform project testing and commissioning', 'Requirements:']

['At\xa0Forte, we’re building economic technology for games. Our end-to-end platform enables the emergence of community economics, a system where the interests of game developers and players are aligned, leading to healthier, sustainable game communities. Our team is composed of longtime industry members (Unity, ngmoco, Riot Games, Electronic Arts, Sony, and Rockstar Games, among others), and is currently working with over 20 acclaimed game developers from across the industry to reimagine the economics of games. We\xa0recently raised $185M\xa0in our Series A, and we’re looking for top talent to join our growing team.', 'As a', 'Director of Economy Optimization', ', you will play a key role in the growth of Forte.\xa0As part of a lean and ambitious organization, you will work cross-functionally with different teams to monitor, evaluate and optimize the performance of the entire portfolio of partner game titles, on an on-going basis.\xa0Your passion for gaming and analytical skills will enable you to dive deeply into individual games to identify opportunities which stand to improve both the player experience and developer outcomes.', 'You are excited to gain exposure to a wide range of different problem spaces -- spanning token economics, game design, tech, business strategy. As a member of the Business Operations & Token Economics team, you are comfortable analyzing user, economic and feature data. Strong candidates possess exceptional business judgement and communication skills to deliver consistent, high quality outcomes.', 'Requirements', 'In this role, you will...', 'Analyze the market economies of specific Forte games - diving deeply into the ecosystems and designs of games to understand user behaviour', 'Based on macro trends and behaviours of key user segments, identify opportunities to improve the experience of players (in specific games and across the entire platform) and token economy outcomes', 'Present data-driven insights and recommendation to internal/external stakeholders and the leadership team', 'Collaborate with the Game Partnerships team to convey and explain economic concepts to game development partners', 'Partner with different teams - such as Games Partnerships, Product, Business Operations & Token Economics - to build out the analytics infrastructure of Forte', 'To be a good fit, you have…', 'Minimum of 8 years of progressive analytical work experience (BA/BS in Economics, Business, Math,Engineering or a related field)', 'Proven ability to draw insights via thoughtful analysis of large user data sets (ideally in consumer internet applications of game themselves)', 'A proven track record of leading engagements', 'A passion for gaming: as a business and an entertainment product', 'Understanding of monetization/retention gaming systems coupled with curiosity to explore game data - in search of opportunities / issues']

['RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Actively involved in enterprise solution design and development in project basis', 'To participate in the entire System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) for successful project delivery, including system development and maintenance for Java applications covering feasibility study, requirement collection, system design, programming, testing and support', 'To assist Solution Consultant in requirement study, analysis, design, documentation and co-ordination with business end users', 'Perform system release support to quality assurance team and business end users', 'Prepare / write relevant documentations like the system design, specifications, test cases and operations documentation', 'Trouble-shoot system/data issues and follow up thoroughly with business end users or technical users', 'REQUIREMENTS:', 'Degree in Computer Science or equivalent', 'At least 2 years of work experience and knowledge in Java technologies like Servlets, JDBC, XML, Hibernate/Mybatis, Tomcat.', 'Experience in MySQL/PostgreSQL database and Restful API.', 'Experience in Git for source control.', 'Solid understanding of OOP principles and design.', 'Strong troubleshoot and problem-solving skills', 'Self-motivated, proactive and energetic team player', 'Customer-oriented and strong interpersonal skills, innovative in providing solutions']

['Everyone at OliveX stands behind these core values:', 'Fun – when you are winning, you have more fun. Not just beer pong and chilled atmosphere. It’s fun when you work hard and achieve something while laughing.', 'Fit – fit means no excess. Ties in with resourcefulness. Also, super PLUS if the person is into fitness', 'Fab – feeling fabulous means being confident without being arrogant, being fab means you are unafraid of other people misunderstanding you. Stand for something. Don’t play it safe. Take a stance so people remember you.', 'Given our rapid business expansion, we are now hiring an Crypto Treasury Accountant to support with overseeing the day-to-day accounting operation and other ad-hoc projects to help grow our market share in Asia Pacific Region.\xa0 You will work closely with the Head of Group Finance to assist with the timely month-end closing and financial reporting for the Group.', 'What you will be doing', 'Prepare daily monitoring and monthly monitoring and reports on crypto market', 'Perform data analysis and financial modeling', 'Perform research tasks related to but not limited to crypto/digital asset']

['Project\xa0Description', 'We are looking for Experienced Test Engineer (Manual and Automation) in HK to join to software and service delivery team within Technology center of Global Investment bank.', 'Responsibilities', '- Design and build the automated test frameworks and test suites for use in development and testing cycles', "- Utilize innovative test technologies to develop a product's testing strategy", '- Participating in design and code inspections.', '- Perform manual testing, the scope of which will encompass all functionality of services to as a prequel to Automation', 'Skills', 'Must have', '- University degree in computer science, information systems or related field of study', '- Prior working experience in a large scale financial institution', '- 5 Years of working experience in automation tools like Cypress, Selenium and TestComplete', '- Strong Python skills for test automation.', '- Have Developed automation frameworks Hybrid framework, Keyword and Data driven.', '- Working experience with APIs testing using tools like Soap UI, Postman, Swagger or Karate framework.', '- Experience in database test automation that includes connection to various database testing - Oracle & SQL server', '- Experience in test strategies, methodologies such as BDD/TDD and Agile', '- Knowledge of other type of testing - e.g. integration, regression, unit, system and user acceptance testing', '- Strong ability to debug code, analyze failures and trace defects to root cause', '- Strong interpersonal communication skills and a successful team player.', '- Extensive experience in Developing, Executing and Maintaining Automation Test Plan, Test Strategy, Test Scenarios and Test Cases and Reporting system.']

['Role Introduction', 'Reports to:', 'Digital & Analytics Manager', 'You are passionate about customer experience, you think that Virtual assistants will be the cornerstone of the customer experience strategy in the coming years.', 'We are looking for a Squad Lead to drive the development of our B2C Virtual Assistants. You will be joining the Customer Care department as well as the B2C Virtual Assistant Agile Squad.', 'You will be working in a fast-paced, Agile & always-changing environment to deliver exceptional conversation flows for our various Virtual Assistants: Chatbot for LiveChat, Whatsapp, Facebook, Wechat but also Voicebot for our customers calling our hotlines around the world.', 'You will be driving the capabilities of our Virtual Assistants to handle as many of our contacts per year as possible.', 'You will contribute to the Customer Care strategy to shift channels from traditional methods of contact (voice calls, emails) to digital solutions (chat bot, voice bot), with the aim of having over a third of our contacts by the end of 2022 being handled by bots.', 'You main responsibility will be to analyse, prioritise, define, design and build conversation flows to support the development of our B2C Bot capability, working hand-in-hand with Product owners, Developers, Architects, Data analysts & Scientists, as well as Customer Care Agents.', 'Candidates should balance technical depth with customer empathy, strong execution capability, and a track record of delivering impactful business results.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Design innovative, user-focused conversational flows & interfaces for our various Voice & Chat bots including multi-modal user experiences', 'Design end-to-end conversational interactions, including what can go wrong, and how', 'Write multimodal conversations to adapt to each channel (Whatsapp, LiveChat, Facebook, Phone)', 'Drive solutions from design workshop to production, from conception to prototype to production-level experience', 'Plan and lead workshops, design reviews, and other types of meetings to align and communicate information to various parties as well as Senior Management', 'Develop mockups, flows and all other creative proto-typing related items']

job description: ['Your New Role', 'You will have the opportunities to manage various projects and work closely with the team to facilitate new initiatives.', 'Responsible for backend system implementation, maintenance and release', 'Develop and maintain APIs to support mobile and web application functionalities based on product requirement under iteration cycles', 'Ensure that architectural design and solution can balance business needs and technical/security standards', 'What makes you succeed', 'University Graduate or High Diploma in Computer Science or related discipline', 'Minimum 3+ years of relevant experience']

['POSITION DESCRIPTION', 'TITLE', ':\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0MARKETING OFFICER', 'RESPONSIBLE TO:\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 HEAD OF MARKETING', 'RESPONSIBLE FOR:\xa0 \xa0HANDLING MARKETING AND DIGITAL INITIATIVES', 'ORGANISATIONAL MISSION', ':', 'The HKMM is an independent, not-for-profit responsible for the collection, documentation and presentation of maritime material culture associated with Hong Kong, the South China Sea and the Pearl River Delta.', 'Working with the Hong Kong Government, members of the Hong Kong Shipowners Association, academic institutions, cultural and community partners, the HKMM is developing an international standard maritime museum and research centre at Pier 8.', 'Our mission is to chronicle, analyse and communicate knowledge about the oceans and their dynamic relationship with the past, present and future of Hong Kong, the mainland of China and the world.\xa0 We particularly explore shipping, maritime trade, naval activity, maritime-related leisure, arts and culture, and the sustainability of the oceans. Through a unique fusion of history, art and science, the HKMM creates crossover learning experiences for local, regional and international audiences. Integral to our mission is to be credible, accessible and inclusive when connecting with our stakeholders communities.', 'POSITION OBJECTIVE', "The function of the Marketing Officer is to work closely with the Head of Marketing in formulating and implementing the Museum's marketing and digital strategies, with the targets of driving visitation, building brand awareness and growing digital presence.", 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES']

This position is exciting and you will work alongside an inspiring team. It would be great if you are an experienced talent who would love to work in this fast-growing eCommerce industry.', 'Roles and responsibilities:', 'Develop more native Apps (IOS', '& Android', ') for different local markets', 'Plan and search for more advanced in-App payment methods', 'Maintain, optimize and debug existing Apps components', 'Work closely with the Marketing Dept. to meet their App enhancement requests']

job title: Technical Officer (BMS) in the Campus Development Office [Ref. A/551/03]
job description: ['Duties', 'Assist in overseeing the day-to-day operation and maintenance of Building Management System (BMS) installed in campus buildings, staff quarters, student hostels and off-campus areas. \xa0The appointee is responsible for:', 'Providing technical support for fault finding, troubleshooting, system diagnosis, data acquisition measurement and monitoring the performance of E&M systems;', 'Supervising contractors to rectify/improve the BMS including software programming, re-design of control logic, repair and calibration of field devices, control loop tuning and optimization, system interface with other systems, point-to-point test, end-to-end test and integrated system functional test;', 'Implementing Wi-Fi sensors and data loggers installation including programming of application software;', 'Monitoring and responding appropriately to alarms, interpreting collected data and proposing solutions;', 'Documenting changes/modifications to BMS and enhancing BMS interface and graphics;', 'Performing energy management and suggesting/implementing energy saving initiatives;', 'Assisting in the safety and technical training; and', 'Attending emergency calls and performing any other assignments.', 'The appointee is required to work night shift.', 'Requirements', 'A Bachelor’s degree/Diploma/Certificate/Apprenticeship in Building Services/Mechanical/Electrical Engineering or related disciplines;', 'At least 3 years’ hands-on experience in design, installation operation and maintenance of BMS, HVAC automation controls, energy management systems or related experience, with a valid safety training course certificate (commonly known as “Green Card”);', 'Proficiency in MS Office applications (including Word and Excel);', 'Good command of written and spoken English and Chinese;', 'Strong sense of risk awareness and responsibility; commitment to teamwork; good interpersonal skills; being self-motivated; capability to supervise in-house and out-sourced works; and ability to work independently under pressure against tight schedules are required.']

['Responsibilities', 'Act as an internal safety and quality specialist providing services in designing and developing safety, quality and asset management systems that support the Business Unit to achieve competitive advantage in an effective and efficiency manner.', 'Review and implement the safety, quality and asset management systems and programmes, including commissioning external parties, to ensure the systems? effectiveness, robustness and efficiency and assure that they are capable to meet the current and emerging business needs.', 'Identify and implement changes to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of the safety, quality and asset management systems to excel organizational performance continuously and in a planned manner.', 'Develop, review, maintain and support safety and integrated management systems? documentation for suitability and adequacy.', 'Provide secretarial support services to various safety and asset related committees.', 'Requirements', 'Degree or equivalent in management, engineering, or science;']

['Senior Research Assistant/Research Assistant I/II (several posts) in the School of Public Health', '(Ref.: 508582) (to commence as soon as possible for one year, with the possibility of renewal subject to satisfactory performance)', 'Applicants should possess a Bachelor’s degree or above, preferably in public health, medical science, biomedicine, or related disciplines. They should have a good command of spoken\xa0and written of English and Chinese, and a keen interest in epidemiological research. They should be organized, responsible, detail-minded, self-motivated, and able to work independently as well as in a team. Experience in clinical research, blood-taking, data management (e.g. using REDCap), statistical analysis, and/or infectious disease epidemiology would be an advantage. Those with 3 years’ relevant experience or more may be considered for appointment as Senior Research Assistant.', 'http://sph.hku.hk/index.php.', 'A highly competitive salary commensurate with qualifications and experience will be offered, in addition to annual leave and medical benefits.', 'The University only accepts online application for the above posts. Applicants should apply online and upload an up-to-date C.V.\xa0\xa0Review of applications will start on November 4, 2021 and continue until', 'December 31, 2021', ', or until the posts are filled, whichever is earlier.']

job title: Cyber Security Consultant & Penetration Tester - Hong Kong
job description: ['Key Key Role', 'As Cyber Security Consultant & Penetration Tester, you will execute a variety of engagements, conducting advanced hands-on penetration testing beyond automated tool validation, which will focus on targets that may include network devices, servers, web and mobile apps, web APIs, wireless infrastructures, IoT devices, and other information systems.', 'You will have the opportunity to combine technical expertise with your imagination to conduct targeted attacks and discover vulnerabilities, with the goal of ensuring wizlynx group’s customers remain one step ahead of its adversaries.', 'What your keys responsibilities will be', 'Responsibilities may include the following, but are not limited to:', 'Collaborate as a participating member of the Cyber Security team', 'Lead and execute penetration tests for network, web and mobile apps, wireless networks as well as social engineering assessments that will vary in level of complexity from simple to potentially', 'Involved in the execution of Red Teaming engagements / Intelligence-led Cyber Attack Simulation Testing (iCAST) exercises', 'Author quality penetration test reports with professional documentation of identified and exploited vulnerabilities/weaknesses']

job description: ['FACULTY OF SOCIAL SCIENCES', 'Department of Sport, Physical Education and Health', 'Post-Doctoral Research Fellow (PR0206/21-22)', 'The appointee is expected to conduct and coordinate research projects in areas of physical fitness assessment of kindergarten students, parental support for children fitness development, functional fitness and resistance training among older adults. Duties include (a) supervision of research assistant and student helpers; (b) coordination of research activities, literature review, data collection (by field tests), data analysis by SPSS) and academic reports/papers writing; and (c) other related responsibilities as required.', 'Requirements:', 'A PhD degree in sports science, exercise psychology, health and fitness, or related disciplines;', 'A good command of written and spoken English and Chinese (including Cantonese);', 'Good communication skills and the ability to work independently; and', 'Priority will be given to candidates who have experience in conducting fitness tests for kindergarten students and writing research reports and manuscripts.', 'Initial appointment will be offered on a fixed-term contract of 12 months. Re-appointment thereafter is subject to mutual agreement and availability of funding.', 'Salary will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.', 'Application Procedure:']

job title: Assistant Director or Associate Director – Physical Climate Product Specialist / ESG
responsibility: ['The Moody’s ESG Solutions Group’s Client Service team is critical to our short and long-term success as an organization.', 'We are successful when our clients accrue continued value from our solutions and services. The Client Service team is expected to provide ‘white glove service’ to our existing client base to ensure they derive maximum value from existing products and uncover new applications and use cases for their organization.', 'The Client Service team understands customer needs and goals and brings technical expertise to support client onboarding, provide training and offer direction throughout all phases of the client life cycle pre- and post-sale in close collaboration with the Product Management, Research, and Sales teams. Achievement of these goals is measured through increased product usage, expanded organizational relationships and reduced client turnover rates. While this group is specifically focused on client retention, it is brought into sales conversations as product experts to help advance and close new business.', 'Climate Product Specialists’ Responsibilities Include', 'Manage client projects from inception to implementation, including:', 'Manage client onboarding and data intake', 'Contribute to and coordinate the preparation and delivery of client deliverables via appropriate channels (e.g., API, SFTP) to ensure clients can easily access results', 'Provide client trainings', 'Serve as clients’ go-to resource for queries related to methodology, data and other technical matters', 'Support clients’ interpretation and application of Moody’s ESG Solutions’ data to their use cases', 'Contribute to business development, including proposal development, in close collaboration with the Sales team and RFP Analysts', 'Systematically gather and share client feedback with Product, Research and other relevant internal groups', 'Work closely with the Product, Research and Sales teams to promote quality improvement and the development of new sources of revenue', 'Track and report on performance KPIs as defined at division level', 'Qualifications', 'Required', 'Master’s degree in environmental science, atmospheric or physical sciences, meteorology, hydrology, or a related field']

job title: Counsellor (2 posts) in the Department of Social and Behavioural Sciences
job description: ['(Appointment up to 30 June 2022)', '[Ref. C/R/362/03]', 'Project: Special Grant for Student Support Services in response to the COVID-19 Pandemic – Support Area 1: Counselling Services - Cyber-bullying related Support and Counselling Services', 'Duties :', 'Provide professional counselling service regarding cyberbullying.\xa0 The appointees will be responsible for conducting assessments and case intervention, and providing psychological support for students and staff involved in cyberbullying. Besides, they will contribute their expertise and experience in handling cyberbullying by designing and conducting training workshops for students and academic staff.', 'Requirements :', 'A Master’s degree in Counselling/Social Work or related disciplines, with at least 5 years’ post-qualification working experience, plus relevant professional qualification.\xa0 Specific work experience in counselling cyberbullying cases and training background in cyberbullying areas are preferred.\xa0 Candidates must be professionally trained to provide counselling service; preferably with experience in conducting workshops and talks on cyberbullying areas.\xa0 They must have good communication and interpersonal skills with students and speak fluent English, Cantonese and Mandarin; should be committed, mature and enthusiastic in creating a healthy campus climate through professional counselling service.', 'Shortlisted candidates will be invited for a written test.', '(Those who have responded to the previous advertisements need not re-apply.)']

job title: Hybrid mobile developer - Saas cloud software company
job description: ['What are you going to do as a Mobile Developer?', 'You are going to work for a Hong Kong Company that provides business process automatic solutions and digital transformation. They have developed mature software that is centralized and comprehensive for corporates to process information and run operations with high flexibility on both web and mobile devices. With different standard modules, from data capture to electronic workflow, this can streamline the daily operation within reach. You will be involved in a new project of developing a hybrid app from scratch. The techniques used in the company are Kotlin, Andriod, object C, swift, flutter etc.', 'What is offered to you?', '* Monthly salary HKD 25,000 to HKD 40,000 per month', '* Medical insurance', '* Flexible work hours', '* Guaranteed the 13th-months', 'What is expected of you?', "* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related studies", '* 2 years experience in Flutter', '* Knowledge in Swift / Objective-C / Kotlin, Andriod studio', '* Knowledge in React Native is a plus', '* Work both independently and can bring up solid idea', 'Where are you going to work?', 'As a Mobile Developer, you will join a local company with over 20 years of experience providing digitalize transformation to many big corporates such as Cannon, Shangari-La hotel group and Fubon bank etc. Their clients not only limited to Asia but also South America and Europe. As the business is scaling up, they are expanding their IT support team in both mainland and Taiwan. Even though the company sizes keep growing, their working culture are still family business with flat hierarchy.', 'Learn more or apply directly?', "How do you feel about this Job? Are you ready for the challenges in this Dynamic Company? You can apply directly, click on the 'Apply' button. For more information about this vacancy or other opportunities, you can contact me at", '[email\xa0protected]', 'or call me on 3511 6201.']
